column6: 0.009#TD4084E.TXT.r#1277483#1277483#TD4084E.TXT.r_4;TD4084E.TXT.r_5# chos rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed  pa ; / +'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo // /

column3: de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyi sras // / +zhugs dang 'bras bur gnas pa ste // / +dpa' bo zung ni bzhir gyur cing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571002#571012#TD4068E.TXT.r_6;TD4068E.TXT.r_7;TD4068E.TXT.r_8;TD4068E.TXT.r_9# rab tu byed pa 'di bshad pa la don rnam pa bzhi dang por bstan dgos te / / +don rnam pa bzhi ni mchod pa'i cho ga brjod pa  dang ; /

column3: skyes bu gang zag brgyad po yin // / +chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos chen po rgyu gdags pa las tshigs gsum pa'o //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571013#571024#TD4068E.TXT.r_8;TD4068E.TXT.r_9;TD4068E.TXT.r_10# 'brel pa dang  dgos pa dang  dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o // / +de la mchod pa'i cho ga brjod pa ni bdag gang la dad pa'i lha'i yon tan bstod cing brjod pa ste / /

column3: rgyu gdags  pa / / +bam po bzhi pa / / +sdom ni / / +'ong ba rnam pa gnyis po dang / / +srung dang sbugs sbubs dang bag yangs dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571025#571036#TD4068E.TXT.r_9;TD4068E.TXT.r_10# de la mchod pa'i cho ga brjod pa ni bdag gang la dad pa'i lha'i yon tan bstod cing brjod pa ste / / +de yang skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi lugs dang mthun par bya ba dang  bgegs kyis bar chad ma byas par  gtsug lag brtsams pa mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir dang por mi brjod du mi rung ngo // /

column3: 'dod pa'i yon tan brtul zhugs bde // / +gyos dang 'od dang mi 'dug dang / / +ri dags pags pa gom pa bdun // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571037#571045#TD4068E.TXT.r_10;TD4068E.TXT.r_11# de yang skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi lugs dang mthun par bya ba dang  bgegs kyis bar chad ma byas par  gtsug lag brtsams pa mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir dang por mi brjod du mi rung ngo // /

column3: phyogs dang smra dang klu gnyis dang / / +lha     // / +gnyis dang ni zhag bdun dang / / +'jug pa dang ni kun dga' bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571046#571055#TD4068E.TXT.r_11;TD4068E.TXT.r_12# de la gtsug lag 'di yang mngon pa'i chos mdzod la 'jug pa'i sgo lta bur gyur ba dang de'i yan lag tu gtogs pa / /

column3: phyogs bzhi dang ni gsung pa dang / / +autpal rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs // / +gzim mal gnyis dang sgo dag dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571056#571064#TD4068E.TXT.r_11;TD4068E.TXT.r_12;TD4068E.TXT.r_13# de la gtsug lag 'di yang mngon pa'i chos mdzod la 'jug pa'i sgo lta bur gyur ba dang de'i yan lag tu gtogs pa / / +bstod pa'i cho ga ni mngon pa'i chos mdzod kyi mgor glengs zin pas / /

column3: nges pa dang ni rgyan rnams dang / / +ngur smrig rtsva dang mi gzhig dang / / +mngon par shes dang snying brtse'i sems / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571065#571075#TD4068E.TXT.r_13;TD4068E.TXT.r_14;TD4068E.TXT.r_15# der  'dus pa'i phyir logs shig tu ma bshad do // / +'brel pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams kyi don du mngon pa'i chos le'u 'bum gsungs te / /

column3: ci'i phyir gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe sa cher gyo zhing sa shin tu cher gyo bar 'gyur zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571076#571085#TD4068E.TXT.r_14;TD4068E.TXT.r_15;TD4068E.TXT.r_16# 'brel pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams kyi don du mngon pa'i chos le'u 'bum gsungs te / / +de ni gzhung mangs pas kun gyis khong du chud par mi 'gyur la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571086#571100#TD4068E.TXT.r_16;TD4068E.TXT.r_17# yi ge nyung ngu gtsug lag chung ngu 'di tsam khong du chud pas  mngon pa'i chos 'bum gyi mtshan nyid la mkhas par 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2337898#2337898#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3151# 'dir bgrang ba zhes bya ba yang bgrang ba'i grangs gcig dang  bcu dang  brgya dang  stong dang   khri dang  'bum la sogs pa'i chos la bya ba ma yin gyi ji tsam du bgrang bar nus pa'i chos la bya bas bgrang bar nus pa'i chos de la de'i phyir bgrang ba zhes pa bshad do zhes bya ba nas / /

column3: smras pa / / +klu'i mthus gyo bar 'gyur te / / +byang  chub sems dpa' dbang che bar grags pa'i sems can gang gi tshe dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571099#571108#TD4068E.TXT.r_16;TD4068E.TXT.r_17;TD4068E.TXT.r_18# yi ge nyung ngu gtsug lag chung ngu 'di tsam khong du chud pas  mngon pa'i chos 'bum gyi mtshan nyid la mkhas PAR 'GYUR TE / / +de ltar na mngon pa'i chos 'bum dang gtsug lag 'dir 'brel to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571108#571117#TD4068E.TXT.r_17;TD4068E.TXT.r_18;TD4068E.TXT.r_19;TD4068E.TXT.r_20# de ltar na mngon pa'i chos 'bum dang gtsug lag 'dir 'brel to // / +dgos pa ni chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir gtsug lag 'di brtsams te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571117#571131#TD4068E.TXT.r_18;TD4068E.TXT.r_19;TD4068E.TXT.r_20;TD4068E.TXT.r_21;TD4068E.TXT.r_22# dgos pa ni chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir gtsug lag 'di brtsams te / / +chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas par bya ba nyid dgos  pa'o ; / / +de la chos rnam pa gnyis te / /

column3: chu na gnas pa'i klu dbang che bar grags so cog gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum  gyi lhums su zhugs so zhes thos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4049E.TXT.r#2304799#2304805#TD4049E.TXT.r_3010# mi slob pa'i chos bcu ni  mi slob pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i dbang du byas par shes par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1029676#1029682#TD4054E.TXT.r_6383;TD4054E.TXT.r_6384# mi slob pa'i  chos bcu ni / / +mi slob pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i dbang du byas par shes par bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4067E.TXT.r#1087125#1087131#TD4067E.TXT.r_27;TD4067E.TXT.r_28# de la don dam pa ni zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga ste / / +tshul khrims kyi phung po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes  mthong pa'i phung po'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4067E.TXT.r#1090780#1090784#TD4067E.TXT.r_699# tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang  de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i  phung po dpag tu med pa ste / /
column8: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571131#571144#TD4068E.TXT.r_22;TD4068E.TXT.r_23# de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga ni gzugs kyi phung po nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar du lnga'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#582952#582954#TD4068E.TXT.r_1577;TD4068E.TXT.r_1578;TD4068E.TXT.r_1579# nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni / / +gzugs kyi phung po nas / / +rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar du lnga'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1400960#1400965#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_151# bcom ldan 'das kyis sh'a  ri'i bu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po shes sam zhes dris pa dang  gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 'tshal to zhes gsol to zhes 'byung  ba lta bu'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1405210#1405213#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_627;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_628# gzugs la sogs pa zhes smos pa ni tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po  bsal ba'i phyir ro // / +tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po zhes bya ba'i phung po gzhan dag kyang yod pas so // /
column12: 0.0#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2582336#2582338#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_5818# rtog pa 'di la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni go rims gang gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po zhes phung po rnams rnam par 'jog pa'i go rims de nyid kyis  de dag gi mi mthun par gyur ba'i sgrib pa 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang  rmugs pa dang gnyid dang  the tshom zhes 'don par 'gyur te / /
column13: 0.0#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2617044#2617049#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10043# de nyid  rnam par grol ba'i phung po yin par yang lta'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po zhes bya ba 'dir blta bar bya'o // /
column14: 0.0#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#768461#768467#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_262# sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims  kyi phung po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po shes sam zhes dris pa dang  gsol pa / /
column15: 0.009#TD4068E.TXT.r#581882#581885#TD4068E.TXT.r_1442;TD4068E.TXT.r_1443;TD4068E.TXT.r_1444# 'dod pa dang  'dod chags gnyis dang ldan pa'i phung po rnams la nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya ste / / +nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni  gzugs kyi phung po nas / /
column16: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1439846#1439847#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_4649# gang  gi tshe lam la tshul khrims kyi phung po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po zhes phung po gsum du mdzad pa na ni shes rab kyi phung po gang zhe na / /
column17: 0.027#TD4080E.TXT.r#856#856#TD4080E.TXT.r_87# gzugs dang  tshor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed dang  rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'das pa'i phung po lnga dang  ma 'ongs pa'i phung po lnga dang   da ltar gyi phung po lnga dang  mya ngan las 'das pa dang  gang zag ste / /
column18: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2955076#2955082#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11971;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11972;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_11973# rnam par grol ba'i phung po lnga rnam pa lnga ste / / +tshul khrims kyi phung po dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes     // /

column3: thos nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang  rjed pa'i phyir 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang  steng du 'byung ste de dag 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang  steng du 'byung bas chu  'khrug par 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571144#571158#TD4068E.TXT.r_23;TD4068E.TXT.r_24;TD4068E.TXT.r_25;TD4068E.TXT.r_26# zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dang   ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571158#571171#TD4068E.TXT.r_25;TD4068E.TXT.r_26;TD4068E.TXT.r_27# rang gi mtshan nyid dang  spyi'i mtshan nyid do // / +de la rang gi mtshan nyid ni dper na    sa'i rang gi mtshan nyid sra ba dang  chu'i rang gi mtshan nyid gsher ba dang  me'i rang gi mtshan nyid tsha ba dang  rlung gi rang gi mtshan nyid gyo ba'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1405213#1405221#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_628# tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po zhes bya ba'i phung po gzhan dag kyang yod pas so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1706316#1706319#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1159# mi slob pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang  ting  nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  shes rab kyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o // /
column8: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#213352#213355#TD4035E.TXT.r_15060;TD4035E.TXT.r_15061# phung po ni brgyad po 'di dag yin te / / +gdags pa'i phung po    dang  yongs su gzung ba'i phung po dang  gnas pa'i phung po dang  'jug pa'i phung po dang  bar du gcod pa'i phung po dang  sdug bsngal gyi phung po dang  dga' ba'i phung po dang  tha ma'i phung po'o // /
column9: 0.023#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2902169#2902170#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4802;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4803# chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la thogs pa med par shes pa ni don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ste / / +rang gi mtshan nyid ni sa'i rang gi mtshan nyid sra ba dang  chu'i rang gi mtshan nyid gsher ba la sogs pa'o // /
column10: 0.024#TD4061E.TXT.r#1537841#1537841#TD4061E.TXT.r_3420# 'on pa rnams rna bas sgra thos par bya ba dang  smyon pas dran pa thob par bya ba dang  gcer bu rnams gos thob par bya ba dang  sems can bkres pa rnams 'grangs par bya ba dang  skom pa rnams ngom par bya ba dang  ngan song du skyes pa rnams ngan song  dag nas thar bar bya zhing mi'i lus thob par bya ba dang  tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams tshul khrims kyi phung po la dgod par bya ba dang  mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang  rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i  phung po la dgod pa dang  bden pa ma mthong ba rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod pa dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  dgra bcom pa nyid dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang  bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i  byang chub la dgod par bya na / /
column11: 0.026#TD4009E.TXT.r#336493#336493#TD4009E.TXT.r_2178# spyi'i mtshan nyid mi shes pa dang  rang gi mtshan nyid dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid mi shes pa'i gnyen pos nang du rang gi sems la brtags pa'i phyir rab tu 'bad pa'o // /
column12: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2716209#2716209#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1862# rang gi mtshan nyid dang  spyi'i mtshan nyid dang  gnas dang  gnas par 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid dang  nye bar spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang  las kyi mtshan nyid dang  cha phra ba'i mtshan nyid do // /
column13: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2582359#2582359#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_5819# shes rab kyi phung po bas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po gong nas 'byung ba'i phyir rgod pa dang 'gyod pa'i sgrib pa  lngar smos par 'gyur ba zhig na de lta yang yin te / /
column14: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#515660#515660#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8574# lnga ni phung po'i mtshan nyid dang  phung po skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  phung po 'jig pa'i mtshan  nyid dang phung po 'gog pa'i chos dang  phung po 'gog pa mngon du bgyi ba'i chos zhes 'byung ngo // /
column15: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#581051#581052#TD4068E.TXT.r_1354# yang na shing gang las me tog 'byung ba dang  'bras bu 'byung ba'i shing de la me tog gi shing 'bras bu'i shing zhes bya ba bzhin du phung po gang las nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid  sred pa 'byung bar byed pa'i phung po la nye bar len pa'i phung po zhes bya'o // /

column3: chu 'khrugs pas gyo bar 'gyur ro // / +gzhan yang gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bas mngon bar 'gyur ba dang  dben pa las skyes pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams mtho bar 'gyur ba'i  phyir rlung gyen du ldang la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571172#571179#TD4068E.TXT.r_26;TD4068E.TXT.r_27;TD4068E.TXT.r_28# de la rang gi mtshan nyid ni dper na    sa'i rang gi mtshan nyid sra ba dang  chu'i rang gi mtshan nyid gsher ba dang  me'i rang gi mtshan nyid tsha ba dang  rlung gi rang gi mtshan nyid gyo ba'o // / +spyi'i mtshan nyid ni mi rtag pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  stong pa dang  bdag med pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571180#571194#TD4068E.TXT.r_28;TD4068E.TXT.r_29# gtsug lag 'di thos na chos de dag  gi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ro // /

column3: rlung gyen du langs pas chu 'khrugs te sa gyo bar 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i snga ltas yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571195#571204#TD4068E.TXT.r_29;TD4068E.TXT.r_30;TD4068E.TXT.r_31# chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pa ni mngon pa'i chos mdzod dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang dpyad zin pas na 'di brtsams pa don med do zhe na / /

column3: ci'i phyir gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571205#571223#TD4068E.TXT.r_30;TD4068E.TXT.r_31;TD4068E.TXT.r_32;TD4068E.TXT.r_33;TD4068E.TXT.r_34;TD4068E.TXT.r_35# lan du slob ma rnam pa gnyis te / / +spros pas shes pa dang   glengs pas shes pa'o // /

column3: 'jig rten dag gi 'jig rten gyi bar mun ba mun nag thibs po gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571224#571234#TD4068E.TXT.r_34;TD4068E.TXT.r_35;TD4068E.TXT.r_36# de dag gi don du ni mngon pa'i chos mdzod la sogs pa yang dgos par 'gyur ro // / +glengs pas shes pa ni mdo tsam du bstan na don mang du khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste / /

column3: 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyi 'od kyis snang bar ma gyur pa gang yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571235#571248#TD4068E.TXT.r_35;TD4068E.TXT.r_36;TD4068E.TXT.r_37# glengs pas shes pa ni mdo tsam du bstan na don mang du khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste / / +de'i phyir gtsug lag 'di brtsams pas na brtsams pa don med pa ma yin no // /

column3: der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang    ba chen po des gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571249#571259#TD4068E.TXT.r_37# yang na khyim na gnas pa kha cig chos kyi mtshan nyid la yang dag par mkhas par 'dod la zhing dang tshong la sogs pa 'phral gyi bya ba la thogs pas gzhung mang por nyan par mi nus pa dang  rab tu  byung ba rnal 'byor yid la byed pa kha cig gzhung mang po mnyan na / /

column3: 'di skad du kye sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhes zer bar gyur zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571260#571270#TD4068E.TXT.r_37;TD4068E.TXT.r_38;TD4068E.TXT.r_39# yang na khyim na gnas pa kha cig chos kyi mtshan nyid la yang dag par mkhas par 'dod la zhing dang tshong la sogs pa 'phral gyi bya ba la thogs pas gzhung mang por nyan par mi nus pa dang  rab tu  byung ba rnal 'byor yid la byed pa kha cig gzhung mang po mnyan na / /

column3: smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' dbang che bar grags pa'i sems can gang gi tshe dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums  su zhugs pa de'i tshe / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571269#571278#TD4068E.TXT.r_38;TD4068E.TXT.r_39;TD4068E.TXT.r_40# rnal 'byor gyi bar chad du 'ang 'gyur du dogs la / / +chos kyi mtshan nyid la'ang mkhas par 'dod pa yod de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571279#571287#TD4068E.TXT.r_40;TD4068E.TXT.r_41;TD4068E.TXT.r_42# de dag gi phyir 'di brtsams pas brtsams pa don med pa ma yin no // /

column3: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang  gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dbang che bar grags so cog gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs so zhes thos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571288#571299#TD4068E.TXT.r_41;TD4068E.TXT.r_42;TD4068E.TXT.r_43;TD4068E.TXT.r_44;TD4068E.TXT.r_45# chos kyi mtshan nyid la  mkhas pa na yang ji dgos she na / / +chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas par ma byas na / / +nyon mongs pa spang bar bya ba'i thabs med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571300#571308#TD4068E.TXT.r_44;TD4068E.TXT.r_45;TD4068E.TXT.r_46# nyon mongs pa ma spangs na 'khor ba'i brtson ra las mi thar ro // / +'khor ba las mthar na mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas mi thob bo // /

column3: thos nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu  dga' zhing bde ba skyes nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571309#571319#TD4068E.TXT.r_46;TD4068E.TXT.r_47;TD4068E.TXT.r_48;TD4068E.TXT.r_49# de bas na  chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas na nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ro // / +nyon mongs pa spangs na / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang  rjed pa'i phyir 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang  yas 'ongs te de dag 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang  yas 'ongs bas 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571320#571329#TD4068E.TXT.r_48;TD4068E.TXT.r_49;TD4068E.TXT.r_50;TD4068E.TXT.r_51;TD4068E.TXT.r_52# 'khor ba'i brtson ra las 'byung ngo // / +'khor ba'i brtson ra las byung na mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas thob ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571329#571338#TD4068E.TXT.r_50;TD4068E.TXT.r_51;TD4068E.TXT.r_52;TD4068E.TXT.r_53# de ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o // / +yang na gtsug lag 'dis     // / +mgo nas mjug tu don rnam pa bzhi ston te / /

column3: 'jig rten dag gi 'jig rten gyi bar mun pa mun nag thibs  po gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571339#571350#TD4068E.TXT.r_52;TD4068E.TXT.r_53;TD4068E.TXT.r_54;TD4068E.TXT.r_55# mgo nas mjug tu don rnam pa bzhi ston te / / +grangs dang  ming dang  rab tu dbye ba dang mtshan nyid do // / +de la phung po lnga zhes bya bas grangs ston to // /

column3: 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyi 'od kyis snang bar ma gyur pa gang yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571350#571363#TD4068E.TXT.r_55;TD4068E.TXT.r_56;TD4068E.TXT.r_57# gzugs kyi phung po dang  tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam  par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya bas ming bstan to // /

column3: der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba chen po des gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571364#571374#TD4068E.TXT.r_56;TD4068E.TXT.r_57;TD4068E.TXT.r_58;TD4068E.TXT.r_59# gzugs gang zhe na zhes bya ba nas / / +me'i khams dang rlung gi khams zhes bya ba yan chad kyis rab tu dbye ba bstan to // /

column3: 'di skad du kye sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta / / +kye sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes ba lta zhes 'dzer to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571373#571385#TD4068E.TXT.r_58;TD4068E.TXT.r_59;TD4068E.TXT.r_60;TD4068E.TXT.r_61;TD4068E.TXT.r_62# sa'i khams gang zhe na / / +sra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas mtshan nyid bstan to // /

column3: gzhan yang gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bas shes rab kyi snang ba chen po 'jig rten du  'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571386#571398#TD4068E.TXT.r_61;TD4068E.TXT.r_62;TD4068E.TXT.r_63# phung po lnga ni zhes bya ba la smras pa / / +phung po drug la sogs par mang du yang ma bshad / /

column3: 'di ni de'i snga ltas yin no // / +ci'i phyir gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe lha'i bu bzhi byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi phyogs bzhir 'khod de chos dang ldan par bsrung ba  dang  bskyab pa dang  sba bar byed ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571399#571410#TD4068E.TXT.r_63;TD4068E.TXT.r_64# bzhir nyung du yang ma bshad par ci'i phyir lnga kho nar grangs nges par bstan / / +de'i yang lan du bdag dang bdag gi dngos po bstan par bya ba'i phyir phung po lnga po kho na  las mang du yang ma bshad nyung du yang ma bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571411#571419#TD4068E.TXT.r_64;TD4068E.TXT.r_65# de'i yang lan du bdag dang bdag gi dngos po bstan par bya ba'i phyir phung po lnga po kho na  las mang du yang ma bshad nyung du yang ma bshad do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571419#571429#TD4068E.TXT.r_65;TD4068E.TXT.r_66;TD4068E.TXT.r_67# de la gzugs kyi phung po dang  tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po bzhi ni bdag gi ba'i dgos pa dngos po ste / /

column3: smras pa / / +sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yun ring po nas 'di lta bur yid smon byed par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571430#571440#TD4068E.TXT.r_66;TD4068E.TXT.r_67;TD4068E.TXT.r_68;TD4068E.TXT.r_69# sems can dag phal cher de la bdag gi yin no zhes chags so // / +rnam par shes  pa'i phung po ni bdag ces bya ba'i dngos po ste / /

column3: kye ma 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa / / +yongs su 'dren pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571441#571452#TD4068E.TXT.r_68;TD4068E.TXT.r_69# sems can dag de la bdag ces 'dzin pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na snod dang  zas dang  tshag tseg dang  byed pa po dang  zab po'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir phung po lnga nyid du bshad kyi drug dang bzhi la sogs pa ma bstan to // /

column3: rgyas byung na ci ma rung snyam ste / / +don de'i dbang la brten nas lha de rnams / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571453#571462#TD4068E.TXT.r_69;TD4068E.TXT.r_70;TD4068E.TXT.r_71# yang na snod dang  zas dang  tshag tseg dang  byed pa po dang  zab po'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir phung po lnga nyid du bshad kyi drug dang bzhi la sogs pa ma bstan to // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi phyogs bzhir 'khod de chos dang ldan par bsrung ba dang  bskyab pa dang  sbed par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571461#571471#TD4068E.TXT.r_69;TD4068E.TXT.r_70;TD4068E.TXT.r_71# yang na snod dang  zas dang  tshag tseg dang  byed pa po dang  zab po'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir phung po lnga nyid du bshad kyi drug dang bzhi la sogs pa ma bstan to // / +de la  snod lta bur gyur pa ni gzugs kyi phung po ste / /

column3: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na  sbubs kyi nang na bzhugs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571472#571479#TD4068E.TXT.r_71;TD4068E.TXT.r_72;TD4068E.TXT.r_73# snod la kha zas brten pa dang 'dra bar tshor ba dang  'du shes la sogs pa'i phung po yang gzugs kyi phung po la brten pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: mngal gyi dri mas kyang ma gos / / +khrag gi dri mas kyang ma gos / / +mi gtsang ba dang  mi gtsang ba las gyur pa ci yang rung ba gang gis kyang ma gos she na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571480#571495#TD4068E.TXT.r_72;TD4068E.TXT.r_73;TD4068E.TXT.r_74;TD4068E.TXT.r_75# zas lta bur gyur pa ni tshor ba'i phung po ste / / +kha zas bza' bar bya ba yin pa bzhin du tshor ba bde ba dang   sdug bsngal yang myong bar bya ba'i dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.029#TD4054E.TXT.r#1009116#1009116#TD4054E.TXT.r_3047;TD4054E.TXT.r_3048;TD4054E.TXT.r_3049# sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin ba'i tshor ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rang gi mtshan  nyid dang  de gnyi ga'i gnas ngan len yongs su 'dzin pa dang  gnyi ga las mthar ba mi rtag pa nyid kyis rjes su bcings par grub pa dang  bde ba ma yin pas kyang 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ba nyid du blta bar bya'o // / +de la sdug bsngal YANG MA YIN / / +bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba ni / /

column3: smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpas ni sngon gyi srid pa zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571494#571505#TD4068E.TXT.r_74;TD4068E.TXT.r_75# tshag tseg lta bur gyur pa ni 'du shes kyi phung po ste / / +kha zas tshod ma la sogs pa tshag tseg dang bsres na lhag par bza' bar nus pa bzhin du mi gtsang ba la gtsang ba dang sdug bsngal la bde bar 'dzin pa'i 'du    shes phyin ci log yod na lhag par tshor ba'i phung po la chags par byed pas so // /

column3: pha ma  dang  nye du dang  bla ma lta bu rnams dang  gzhan dge sbyong dang bram ze gnod par bya ba ma yin pa dang  gnod par byed pa la mi dga' ba gang yin pa de dag la khyim rnam par dag pa rnams dang  gding ba dang bgo ba rnam par dag ba rnams dang  zas dang  skom dang  bca' ba  dang  bza' ba dang  gos dang  spos dang  me tog phreng dang  byug pa dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  gnas dang  mar me byin pa dang  rnam par dag pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la bya ba byas pas na las de dang mthun bar yum gyi lhums kyang de ltar grub bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571504#571515#TD4068E.TXT.r_75;TD4068E.TXT.r_76# kha zas tshod ma la sogs pa tshag tseg dang bsres na lhag par bza' bar nus pa bzhin du mi gtsang ba la gtsang ba dang sdug bsngal la bde bar 'dzin pa'i 'du    shes phyin ci log yod na lhag par tshor ba'i phung po la chags par byed pas so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571516#571525#TD4068E.TXT.r_75;TD4068E.TXT.r_76;TD4068E.TXT.r_77# kha zas tshod ma la sogs pa tshag tseg dang bsres na lhag par bza' bar nus pa bzhin du mi gtsang ba la gtsang ba dang sdug bsngal la bde bar 'dzin pa'i 'du    shes phyin ci log yod na lhag par tshor ba'i phung po la chags par byed pas so // / +byed pa po lta bur gyur ba ni 'du byed kyi phung po ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571525#571535#TD4068E.TXT.r_77;TD4068E.TXT.r_78;TD4068E.TXT.r_79# las dge ba dang  mi dge ba dang  de'i 'bras bu bde ba dang sdug bsngal 'du byed kyi phung po sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571536#571545#TD4068E.TXT.r_79;TD4068E.TXT.r_80;TD4068E.TXT.r_81;TD4068E.TXT.r_82# las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang mjug tu rnam par shes pas myong ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: ci'i  phyir byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na lus bag yangs su gnas par gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571546#571557#TD4068E.TXT.r_80;TD4068E.TXT.r_81;TD4068E.TXT.r_82;TD4068E.TXT.r_83;TD4068E.TXT.r_84;TD4068E.TXT.r_85;TD4068E.TXT.r_86;TD4068E.TXT.r_87# 'o na dang por gzugs kyi phung po bshad / / +de'i 'og tu tshor ba / / +de'i 'og tu 'du shes / /

column3: de skyed pa'i yum gyi lhums na gnas pa thams cad tshang bar mthong zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571556#571565#TD4068E.TXT.r_85;TD4068E.TXT.r_86;TD4068E.TXT.r_87# rim pa 'di  ltar ci'i phyir bkod ce na / / +smras pa / /

column3: smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpas ni sngon gyi srid pa zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#933828#933829#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5634# 'dzin pa'i sgras ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs la bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#956338#956340#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8502# 'dzin pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs la bya ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2874827#2874829#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_991# de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi  rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs kyis srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge ba spong zhing dge ba la 'jug par byed de / /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2897270#2897272#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4106# de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs kyis mi bde ba myong bar ni sdug bsngal ba zhes bya'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571566#571587#TD4068E.TXT.r_87;TD4068E.TXT.r_88# ji ltar spom rim mam rags rim gyis rim pa 'di ltar bkod de / / +gzugs kyi phung po ni thogs pa dang bcas pa dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i rten du gyur pa dang  mig nas  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug gi dmigs par gyur pa'i phyir thams cad pas rags shing sbom pas na dang por gzugs kyi phung po bshad do // /
column9: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#586991#586993#TD4068E.TXT.r_2051# gnas ngan len gyi gyeng ba dang  yid la byed pa'i gyeng ba dang  de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs la ni rang bzhin gyis gyeng ba zhes bya ste / /
column10: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#605651#605652#TD4068E.TXT.r_4033# mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa  lnga'i rten nam gnas ni mig gi skye mched nas lus kyi skye mched kyi bar du skye mched lnga la bya bar grags na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang rten grags bas de'i phyir gnas dang rten bstan par bya ba'i phyir rnam bar shes pa drug po 'gags ma thag pa la yid kyi khams zhes bshad pa dang    khams bco brgyad du 'gyur ro // /
column11: 0.008#TD4068E.TXT.r#607600#607600#TD4068E.TXT.r_4220# bco lnga dang tha ma gsum gyi cha'o zhes bya ba la mig gi dbang po nas lus kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po lnga'i khams dang  gzugs nas reg bya'i bar du yul lnga'i  khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i khams te / /

column3: pha ma dang  nye du dang  bla ma lta bu  rnams dang  gzhan dge sbyong dang  bram ze gnod par bya ba ma yin pa dang  gnod par bya ba la mi dga' ba gang yin ba de dag la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4051E.TXT.r#1235869#1235869#TD4051E.TXT.r_524;TD4051E.TXT.r_525# lta ba la sogs pa drug ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa nas / / +yid la sogs pa'i bar du ci rigs su sbyar ro // /
column5: 1.788#TD4068E.TXT.r#593855#593859#TD4068E.TXT.r_2827;TD4068E.TXT.r_2828;TD4068E.TXT.r_2829# dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'i shes pa de la yang rnam pa drug yod de /// / +mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du / /
column6: 0.018#TD4068E.TXT.r#601557#601557#TD4068E.TXT.r_3589;TD4068E.TXT.r_3590# gang yang mig gi rnam par shes pa nas / / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du drug po 'gags ma thag pa la yid ces bya ba yang mig nas lus kyi bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i rten ni mig gi dbang po nas lus kyi dbang po'i bar du lnga yin par  grags na / /
column7: 0.021#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1597337#1597337#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_460;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_461;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_462# tshogs drug ste / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa nas / / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar ro // /
column8: 0.024#TD4066E.TXT.r#2114260#2114260#TD4066E.TXT.r_1711# de ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug ste mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#589484#589488#TD4068E.TXT.r_2334;TD4068E.TXT.r_2335# mi brtan pa dang brtan pa'o // / +de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug ni mi brtan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba zhes bya ste / /
column10: 0.028#TD4091E.TXT.r#696466#696466#TD4091E.TXT.r_260;TD4091E.TXT.r_261# de yang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du'o // /
column11: 0.028#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2947101#2947102#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_10970# rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug la bya ste / /
column12: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#589735#589735#TD4068E.TXT.r_2357;TD4068E.TXT.r_2358# de las sems gzhan 'byung ba dang mi mthun pa'i  lus des mig gi rnam par shes pa nas / / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug sems las byung ba'i 'khor dang bcas par 'byung ba'i bgegs byas nas ril gyis mi 'byung bas bkag pas na / /
column13: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#933828#933828#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5634# 'dzin pa'i sgras ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs la bya ste / /
column14: 0.029#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#956339#956339#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8502# 'dzin pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs la bya ste / /
column15: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2874828#2874828#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_991# de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi  rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs kyis srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge ba spong zhing dge ba la 'jug par byed de / /
column16: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2897271#2897271#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4106# de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs kyis mi bde ba myong bar ni sdug bsngal ba zhes bya'o // /
column17: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#586992#586992#TD4068E.TXT.r_2051# gnas ngan len gyi gyeng ba dang  yid la byed pa'i gyeng ba dang  de la mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs la ni rang bzhin gyis gyeng ba zhes bya ste / /
column18: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#605651#605651#TD4068E.TXT.r_4033# mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa  lnga'i rten nam gnas ni mig gi skye mched nas lus kyi skye mched kyi bar du skye mched lnga la bya bar grags na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang rten grags bas de'i phyir gnas dang rten bstan par bya ba'i phyir rnam bar shes pa drug po 'gags ma thag pa la yid kyi khams zhes bshad pa dang    khams bco brgyad du 'gyur ro // /

column3: khyim yangs pa rnams dang  gding ba dang  bgo ba yangs pa rnams dang  zas dang  skom dang  bca' ba dang  bza' ba dang  gos dang   spos dang  me tog phreng dang  byug pa dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  gnas dang  mar me byin pa dang  rnam par dag pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la bya ba byas pas na las de dang mthun par yum gyi lhums na de ltar gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571588#571597#TD4068E.TXT.r_88;TD4068E.TXT.r_89# gzugs kyi phung po ni thogs PA DANG BCAS PA DANG  mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i rten du gyur pa dang  mig nas  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug gi dmigs par gyur pa'i phyir thams cad pas rags shing sbom pas na dang por gzugs kyi phung po bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571598#571605#TD4068E.TXT.r_88;TD4068E.TXT.r_89# gzugs kyi phung po ni thogs PA DANG BCAS PA DANG  mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i rten du gyur pa dang  mig nas  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa drug gi dmigs par gyur pa'i phyir thams cad pas rags shing sbom pas na dang por gzugs kyi phung po bshad do // / +gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi las 'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po  bas tshor ba'i phung po rags te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571606#571615#TD4068E.TXT.r_89;TD4068E.TXT.r_90;TD4068E.TXT.r_91# gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi las 'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po  bas tshor ba'i phung po rags te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571624#571629#TD4068E.TXT.r_91;TD4068E.TXT.r_92;TD4068E.TXT.r_93# rkang pa na bar tshor ro zhes 'jig rten pa dag gsal bar tha snyad du 'dogs pas na de'i 'og tu tshor ba'i phung po bshad do // / +'du byed kyi phung po DANG RNAM PAR SHES PA'I phung po bas 'du shes kyi phung po rags te / /

column3: ci'i phyir gang gi tshe byang chub    sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na zhugs pa de'i tshe de skyed pa'i yum 'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.022#TD4068E.TXT.r#571604#571605#TD4068E.TXT.r_89# gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi las 'du shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po  bas tshor ba'i phung po rags te / /

column3: 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyis skyes pa la yid mi sems she na / / +smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpas ni sngon gyi srid pa zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571630#571645#TD4068E.TXT.r_92;TD4068E.TXT.r_93;TD4068E.TXT.r_94;TD4068E.TXT.r_95# 'du byed kyi phung po dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po bas 'du shes kyi phung po rags te / / +'di ni bud med 'di  ni skyes pa zhes yul la mtshan mar 'dzin pa rtogs par sla bas na de'i 'og tu 'du shes kyi phung po bshad do // /

column3: bdag nyid kyang tshangs par spyad  par gyur cing thag bsrings te spyod pa dang  dag cing gtsang la dri nga ba med pa dang  'khrig pa spangs shing grong gi chos dang bral ba / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571646#571653#TD4068E.TXT.r_95# las dge ba dang mi dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid khong du chud par sla zhing 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs  pa sems las byung zhing skyes pa na 'dod chags shig skyes so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571654#571661#TD4068E.TXT.r_95;TD4068E.TXT.r_96# las dge ba dang mi dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid khong du chud par sla zhing 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs  pa sems las byung zhing skyes pa na 'dod chags shig skyes so // /

column3: gzhan dag kyang tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas na / / +las de dang mthun par yum gyi sems kyang de ltar gnas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571660#571672#TD4068E.TXT.r_95;TD4068E.TXT.r_96;TD4068E.TXT.r_97# las dge ba dang mi dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid khong du chud par sla zhing 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs  pa sems las byung zhing skyes pa na 'dod chags shig skyes so // / +zhe sdang zhig skyes so zhes zhe sdang tshor zhing shes par sla bas de'i 'og tu 'du byed kyi phung po bshad do // /

column3: ci'i  phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe skyed pa'i yum brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga yang dag par blangs te / /

column3: ma byin par len pa dang  mi tshangs par  spyod pa dang  brdzun du smra ba dang  'bru'i chang dang  bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te / /

column3: 'bru'i chang dang  bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar log par gyur ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392635#2392638#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9693# bstan bcos rnal 'byor  spyod pa'i sa las kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni gzugs med pa'i khams nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni rgyu mtshan med pa'i dmigs pa rnam par rig pas tshad med pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392665#2392666#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9695# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched de mtha' med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4029E.TXT.r#2128149#2128150#TD4029E.TXT.r_1052# zad par gyi skye mched ni zad par sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag go // /
column7: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920059#920064#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3766# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang   rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang  cung zad med min skye mched dang  'gog ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang brgyad de / /
column8: 0.0#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920172#920174#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3785# thams cad skye mched bcu ni sa dang  chu dang  me dang  rlung ste 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar  po ste kha dog bzhi dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched gnyis kyis bsnan te bcu'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2901487#2901495#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4718;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_4719# gzugs kyi khams kyi sems can gyi rnam par shes pa ni tshor ba'i phung po la rten to // / +gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam  shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang gsum gyi sems can gyi rnam par shes pa ni 'du shes kyi phung po la rten to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#17561#17564#TD4036E.TXT.r_2548# bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; /
column11: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#24154#24158#TD4036E.TXT.r_3649# gang zag lus kyis mngon du byed pa rnam par thar pa brgyad po gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba dang  nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs    rnams la lta ba dang  sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'du  shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa dag lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing / /
column12: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#24787#24790#TD4036E.TXT.r_3774# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; /

column14: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2760271#2760274#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8433;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8434# de ma thob pas bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa'i sems ni mi skye ba de lta bu dang  'di ltar 'di na la las bsam gtan dang po dang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes     // /
column15: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3114472#3114476#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3285# bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang   gsum pa dang  bsam gtan bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched pa'o // /
column16: 0.0#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876729#1876729#TD4039E.TXT.r_7186# rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la  ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi phyi rol du bltas pa'i dmigs pa'i gyo ba tsam las dben pa'i phyir mi gyo bar rig par bya ste / /

column21: 0.0#TD4066E.TXT.r#2106365#2106365#TD4066E.TXT.r_602# tshad med pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag ste / /

column25: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282113#1282113#TD4086E.TXT.r_338# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye    skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni kha dog med do // /
column26: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1599138#1599139#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_775# zad par nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni phung po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis  bsdus so // /
column27: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1623472#1623475#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4812# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha'  yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched do // /

column29: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#754197#754197#TD4091E.TXT.r_10739# ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi mjug thogs su rang gis pa dang  rnam shes mtha' yas dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas kyi skye mched kyis pa'i dag pa dang  zag pa med pa / /

column32: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1706360#1706361#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1164;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1165# la la zad par sa'o zhes steng dang 'og dang thad kar gnyis su med cing tshad med par 'du shes su byed cing la la zad par chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do zhes steng dang 'og dang thad kar gnyis su med cing tshad med par 'du shes su byed do zhes bka' stsal to // /
column33: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1706756#1706758#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1196;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1197# dge slong dag skye mched ni bzhi po 'di dag ste / / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skya mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do zhes bka' stsal to // /

column36: 0.018#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093832#3093833#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_118# gzugs med pa'i khams kyi dngos po nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skyed mched la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa'o // /
column37: 0.027#TD4067E.TXT.r#1094198#1094198#TD4067E.TXT.r_1299;TD4067E.TXT.r_1300# 'di dag ni gzugs kyi khams so // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  rnam shes  mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba 'di ni gzugs med pa'i khams te / /
column38: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2730174#2730174#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4182# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa na ji lta ba bzhin du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa na yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o // /

column3: smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpas ni  sngon gyi srid pa zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#993899#993899#TD4054E.TXT.r_417# gang gis nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched shes pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571716#571726#TD4068E.TXT.r_103# gzugs med pa'i khams na ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i  skye mched na ni rnam par shes pa 'du shes la brten pas de'i 'og tu 'du shes kyi phung po bstan to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#697711#697711#TD4091E.TXT.r_489# zad par gyi skye mched las ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa bzhi rnams ni phung po bzhi'i rang bzhin  yin pa'i phyir yid dang chos kyi skye mched gnyis kyis so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1416465#1416465#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1873# dgu pa dang bcu pa zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag ni 'og nas 'chad par     // /
column8: 0.0#TD4099E.TXT.r#116898#116900#TD4099E.TXT.r_2419;TD4099E.TXT.r_2420# nam mkha'  mtha' yas skye mched la ma yin / / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la ma yin / /
column9: 0.013#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1481762#1481762#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9543# rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang  med pa'i skye mched ces bya'o // /
column10: 0.015#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#864107#864107#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15805;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_15806# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do // / +rnam shes mtha'  yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyang de dang 'dra'o // /
column11: 0.018#TD4039E.TXT.r#1843720#1843721#TD4039E.TXT.r_3480# de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi 'du shes spangs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi 'du shes dang   rnam par shes pa dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi 'du shes yid la byed do // /
column12: 0.019#TD4044E.TXT.r#389862#389862#TD4044E.TXT.r_1483# gzugs kyi 'du shes dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nam mkha'i 'du shes dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pa'i 'du shes dang  ci  yang med pa'i skye mched kyi ci yang med do zhes bya ba'i 'du shes so // /

column3: bdag nyid kyang srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar log par gyur la gzhan dag kyang srog gcod pa spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang  bdag nyid kyis kyang ma byin par len pa dang  mi tshangs par spyod pa dang   brdzun du smra ba dang  'bru'i chang dang  bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571724#571735#TD4068E.TXT.r_103;TD4068E.TXT.r_104# gzugs med pa'i khams na ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i  skye mched na ni rnam par shes pa 'du shes la brten pas de'i 'og tu 'du shes kyi phung po bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571735#571749#TD4068E.TXT.r_104;TD4068E.TXT.r_105# srid pa'i rtse mo cung zad med cung zad med min skye mched na ni rnam par shes pa sems las byung ba'i tshogs 'du byed kyi chos la brten pas de'i 'og tu 'du byed kyi phung po bstan to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#589851#589852#TD4068E.TXT.r_2367# 'phags pa cung zad med pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba de srid pa'i rtse mo cung zad med cung zad med min skye mched kyi nyon mongs pa spongs pa'i phyir chas shing nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir brtson pa nas srid pa'i rtse  mo nas gyen du bskyod pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'bru'i chang dang  bcos pa'i chang dang  myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar log par gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571750#571758#TD4068E.TXT.r_105;TD4068E.TXT.r_106# rnam  par shes pa ni de dag kun tu 'gro ba'i phyir mjug tu smos so // /

column3: gzhan dag kyang 'bru'i chang dang  bcos pa'i chang myos par  'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571759#571768#TD4068E.TXT.r_106;TD4068E.TXT.r_107# gzugs kyi phung po rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir gzugs gang zhe na zhes dris so // /

column3: las de dang mthun par yum gyi sems kyang de ltar gnas so // / +ci'i phyir gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na zhugs pa de'i tshe de skyed pa'i yum lus ngal ba med cing lus dub pa med de bde ba     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571769#571784#TD4068E.TXT.r_107;TD4068E.TXT.r_108;TD4068E.TXT.r_109;TD4068E.TXT.r_110# brgal ba gong du ming tsam du bstan pa'i tshe ni gzugs kyi phung bo zhes smras la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571785#571792#TD4068E.TXT.r_108;TD4068E.TXT.r_110;TD4068E.TXT.r_109;TD4068E.TXT.r_111# 'dir gzugs kyi phung po gang zhe na zhes mi 'dri bar  ci'i phyir gzugs gang zhe na zhes 'dri / / +gzugs las ma gtogs par phung po logs shig na med de / /

column3: dang nad med par gyur zhe na / / +smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang che bar grags pa yin te / / +de'i gzi byin chen pos yum gyi 'byung ba chen po rnams rgyas par gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571791#571806#TD4068E.TXT.r_110;TD4068E.TXT.r_111;TD4068E.TXT.r_112# gzugs las ma gtogs par phung po logs shig na med de / / +nas dang 'bras la sogs pa'i phung po bzhin no // /

column3: rgyu des na byang chub sems dpa'i yum zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar ro // / +ci'i phyir gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums nas byung ba de'i tshes cher gyos par gyur zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571807#571830#TD4068E.TXT.r_112;TD4068E.TXT.r_113# dper na nas dang 'bras grub na phung po yang zla la grub pa dang 'dra bar gzugs grub na phung po yang zla la grub bas  gzugs gang zhe na zhes dris kyang nyes pa med do // /
column5: 0.028#TD4068E.TXT.r#573346#573346#TD4068E.TXT.r_317;TD4068E.TXT.r_318# gzugs gang zhe na zhes dris te / / +gzugs kyi mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column3: smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang che bar grags pa'i sems can yin te zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sngar bstan pa bzhin du sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571828#571839#TD4068E.TXT.r_113;TD4068E.TXT.r_114# yang na gzugs kyi don sngar bstan nas phung po'i don phyis 'chad pas gzugs gang zhe na zhes dris kyi gzugs kyi phung po gang zhe na zhes ma dris so // /

column3: ci'i phyir gang gi tshe byang chub  sems dpa' yum gyi lhums nas byung ba de'i tshe 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571840#571864#TD4068E.TXT.r_114# cung zad gzugs gang yin pa de dag thams cad ces bya ba ni gang gzugs kyi rnam grangs  su gzhag pa 'das pa'i gzugs dang  ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dang  da ltar gyi gzugs dang  gzugs bzang po dang  gzugs ngan pa dang  gzugs ring ba dang  gzugs thung ba dang  gzugs phra ba dang  gzugs sbom po zhes bya ba de dag thams cad    'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs dang  'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs su 'dus so zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de yang rgyas par sngar bstan pa bzhin du sbyar ro // / +ci'i phyir gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums nas byung ba de'i tshe / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571865#571874#TD4068E.TXT.r_114;TD4068E.TXT.r_115;TD4068E.TXT.r_116# cung zad gzugs gang yin pa de dag thams cad ces bya ba ni gang gzugs kyi rnam grangs  su gzhag pa 'das pa'i gzugs dang  ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dang  da ltar gyi gzugs dang  gzugs bzang po dang  gzugs ngan pa dang  gzugs ring ba dang  gzugs thung ba dang  gzugs phra ba dang  gzugs sbom po zhes bya ba de dag thams cad    'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs dang  'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs su 'dus so zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: de skyed pa'i yum 'dug pa 'am / / +'phres  par ma gyur te / / +'greng bzhin du rgyal rigs mo de las rgyal rigs bltams she na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571872#571890#TD4068E.TXT.r_114;TD4068E.TXT.r_115;TD4068E.TXT.r_116;TD4068E.TXT.r_117;TD4068E.TXT.r_118;TD4068E.TXT.r_119# cung zad gzugs gang yin pa de dag thams cad ces bya ba ni gang gzugs kyi rnam grangs  su gzhag pa 'das pa'i gzugs dang  ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dang  da ltar gyi gzugs dang  gzugs bzang po dang  gzugs ngan pa dang  gzugs ring ba dang  gzugs thung ba dang  gzugs phra ba dang  gzugs sbom po zhes bya ba de dag thams cad    'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs dang  'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs su 'dus so zhes bya ba'i don to // / +de nas gzugs rnam pa gnyis pa bstan te / /

column3: smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi ring po nas nad nyung bar 'gyur ba'i las 'bras bu yod pa rnams byas shing bsags te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571887#571899#TD4068E.TXT.r_117;TD4068E.TXT.r_118;TD4068E.TXT.r_119;TD4068E.TXT.r_120# de la 'byung ba chen po bzhi zhes bya bas rgyu'i gzugs bstan  te ; / +gzugs thams cad kyi rgyu ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#572092#572096#TD4068E.TXT.r_151;TD4068E.TXT.r_149;TD4068E.TXT.r_150# de las 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag ni rgyu rnam pa lngas 'byung ba chen po las gyur pa'i gzugs kyi rgyu byed de / /
column6: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1324804#1324805#TD4037E.TXT.r_1275;TD4037E.TXT.r_1276# 'di ltar 'du byed kyi don dang  lta ba'i don dang  nye bar 'dogs pa'i don du'o // / +gal te gzugs la sogs par ming du btags pa'i dngos po la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming rnam par mi 'jog na ni / /
column7: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1190386#1190386#TD4047E.TXT.r_9903;TD4047E.TXT.r_9904# mchod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni bkur sti byas nas zhes bya ba'i don to // / +gyur pas shes pa dang mi ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyang 'du shes rnam pa gnyis kyis rnam     // /
column8: 0.028#TD4044E.TXT.r#391164#391164#TD4044E.TXT.r_1727;TD4044E.TXT.r_1728# nges par skyed par byed pa'i don to // / +ji ltar snang bas yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzugs ni rab tu mthong bar gyur pa de bzhin du / /
column9: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#775283#775284#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1402;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_1403# smras pa'i tshig ni dbang du bya ba la rab tu bstan par bya ba'i don te / / +zag pa dang bcas pa'i rnam grangs bshad pas bar du chod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dbang du bya ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: rnam par smin pa mngon du phyogs shing nye bar 'ongs pas na des  'dug pa 'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571896#571908#TD4068E.TXT.r_119;TD4068E.TXT.r_120# 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs zhes bya bas 'bras bu'i gzugs bstan to // / +de la 'byung ba'i don ci dkar po dang  ser po la sogs pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs chen po de dag de las  'byung zhing skye bas na 'byung ba'o // /

column3: 'phres pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar mi 'gyur te / / +rgyu des zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571907#571916#TD4068E.TXT.r_120;TD4068E.TXT.r_121;TD4068E.TXT.r_122# de la 'byung ba'i don ci dkar po dang  ser po la sogs pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs chen po de dag de las  'byung zhing skye bas na 'byung ba'o // /
column5: 0.019#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1622503#1622503#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4648;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4649# de ni sems bcu gcig gi mjug thogs su 'byung ste / / +'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa dang  spyod lam pa dang  rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag dang  mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi lnga dang  sbyor ba las  byung ba ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa na spyod pa gsum las so // /

column3: ci'i phyir gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums nas byung ba de'i tshe lha'i bu bzhi phyogs bzhir 'khod nas ri dags aa dzi na'i pags pa'i sleb mos blang  she na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571917#571926#TD4068E.TXT.r_121;TD4068E.TXT.r_122;TD4068E.TXT.r_123# rgyur byas pa'i gzugs bcu gcig la khyab pas na chen po'o // / +yang na skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin bas na 'byung pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571926#571939#TD4068E.TXT.r_123;TD4068E.TXT.r_124;TD4068E.TXT.r_125# yang nas dang chu dang me dang rlung 'di dag sems can gyi las kyis 'byung bas na 'byung ba'o // /

column3: smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpas ni yun ring po nas nad nyung bar 'gyur ba'i las 'bras bu yod pa rnams byas shing bsags te rnam par smin pa mngon du phyogs shing nye bar 'ongs pas na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571940#571956#TD4068E.TXT.r_124;TD4068E.TXT.r_125;TD4068E.TXT.r_126;TD4068E.TXT.r_127;TD4068E.TXT.r_128;TD4068E.TXT.r_129# chen po ni sa'i  khams 'di dag gnas pa che ste / / +thog thag tu khyab par mngon sum du snang ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: de sa la lhung na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba de yang myong bar mi 'gyur te / / +rgyu des na zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571957#571967#TD4068E.TXT.r_128;TD4068E.TXT.r_129;TD4068E.TXT.r_130;TD4068E.TXT.r_131# chu'i bskal pa byung bas bsam gtan dang po pa man chad 'jig par byed do // / +me'i khams 'di  yang che ste / /

column3: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bltams ma thag tu sus kyang ma bzung bar gom pa bdun bor zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571968#571975#TD4068E.TXT.r_131;TD4068E.TXT.r_132;TD4068E.TXT.r_133# me'i bskal pas bsam gtan gnyis pa man chad sreg par byed do // / +rlung gi khams kyang che ste / /

column3: smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpas ni yun ring po nas nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i dran pa kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas    pas na des de nyid dgongs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571976#571990#TD4068E.TXT.r_133;TD4068E.TXT.r_134;TD4068E.TXT.r_135;TD4068E.TXT.r_136# nam sems can gti mug bdo ba na rlung gi bskal pas bsam gtan gsum pa man chad 'jig par byed do // /

column3: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur te / / +byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'byung ba de'i snga ltas ni de yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#571991#572003#TD4068E.TXT.r_134;TD4068E.TXT.r_135;TD4068E.TXT.r_136;TD4068E.TXT.r_137# 'o na  ci'i phyir 'byung ba chen po bzhi kho nar bshad la lnga dang gsum la sogs par bshad / / +smras pa / / +sa bon gyi rten dang  sa bon brlan pa dang  sa bon smin pa dang  'phel bar 'di bzhi kho nas byed de / /

column3: rgyu des na zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar ro // / +ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'  bltams ma thag tu phyogs bzhir gzigs she na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#572002#572013#TD4068E.TXT.r_136;TD4068E.TXT.r_137# sa bon gyi rten dang  sa bon brlan pa dang  sa bon smin pa dang  'phel bar 'di bzhi kho nas byed de / / +lngar bshad du ni dgos pa med gsum du bshad na mi nus pas khri'i rkang pa  bzhin te bzhi kho nar bshad do // /

column3: smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpas ni yun ring po nas rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas na des de nyid dgongs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#572014#572029#TD4068E.TXT.r_137;TD4068E.TXT.r_138;TD4068E.TXT.r_139;TD4068E.TXT.r_140;TD4068E.TXT.r_141# lngar bshad du ni dgos pa med gsum du bshad na mi nus pas khri'i rkang pa  bzhin te bzhi kho nar bshad do // / +de la sa bon gyi rten ni sa'i khams kyis byed do // /

column3: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag  par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te / / +'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi gzigs pa de'i snga ltas ni de yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#572024#572037#TD4068E.TXT.r_138;TD4068E.TXT.r_139;TD4068E.TXT.r_140;TD4068E.TXT.r_141;TD4068E.TXT.r_142;TD4068E.TXT.r_143# de la sa bon gyi rten ni sa'i khams kyis byed do // / +sa bon brlan bar ni chu'i khams kyis byed do // / +sa bon smin par ni me'i khams kyis byed do // /

column3: rgyu des na zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar ro // / +ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas btsas ma thag tu tshig tu 'di ni bdag gi srid pa rnams kyi nang na skye ba'i tha ma  yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#572038#572054#TD4068E.TXT.r_142;TD4068E.TXT.r_143;TD4068E.TXT.r_144;TD4068E.TXT.r_145# bskal pa nam mkha'i khams kyang sa bon skye ba     // / +la go skabs 'byed bar byed na des bsnan te ci'i phyir 'byung ba chen po lngar me gzhag / /

column3: 'di ni bdag gi srid pa rnams kyi nang na skye ba'i tha ma yin no zhes gsung zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#572055#572069#TD4068E.TXT.r_145;TD4068E.TXT.r_146;TD4068E.TXT.r_147;TD4068E.TXT.r_148# go skabs 'byed par byed pa ni gzugs can gyi chos kyis byed la nam mkha' la ni gzugs med pas go skabs 'byed pa med pa dang  'byung ba chen po bzhi ni skye ba  dang ; /

column3: smras pa / / +byang chub sems dpa' ni yum gyi lhums so cog gis yongs su gzir cing yongs su gdungs pa'i phyir thugs chad pa'i tshig tu 'di ni bdag gi srid pa rnams kyi nang na  skye ba'i tha ma yin no // /

column6: 0.023#TD4068E.TXT.r#573663#573664#TD4068E.TXT.r_367;TD4068E.TXT.r_368# lan du rna ba'i yul te zhes bya ba smos te / / +sgra ni rna ba'i dbang po dang   rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes pa'i yul yin gyi mig la sogs pa dbang po gzhan gyi yul ma yin no zhes thun mong ma yin par ston to // /

column9: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#602234#602234#TD4068E.TXT.r_3663# dus dang  rgyud dang  rnam pa dang  'gro ba dang   yul tha dad pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te / /
column10: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2085224#2085224#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15555;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15556# ji ltar dpe nye bar bkod nas dngos bstan pa'i phyir / / +yul snang bar gyur pa dang zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te / /

column3: kun dga' bo nga yum gyi lhums nas byung nas ring po ma lon par  tshig tu 'di ni bdag gi srid pa rnams kyi nang na skye ba'i tha ma yin no // /

column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#573594#573603#TD4068E.TXT.r_360# rnam par rig byed ni tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba'i chos la goms pas thal mo sbyor ba dang  phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i lus kyi las dang  tshe rabs snga ma la mi dge ba la goms pas khu tshur bcangs pa dang  rdeg pa la sogs  pas lus kyi las la rnam par rig byed ces bya'o // /
