column44: 0.018#TD4068E.TXT.r#585866#585875#TD4068E.TXT.r_1914;TD4068E.TXT.r_1915;TD4068E.TXT.r_1916;TD4068E.TXT.r_1917# rnam par 'tshe ba'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir rnam par 'tshe BA GANG ZHE NA ZHES dris te / /
column45: 0.025#TD4068E.TXT.r#580982#580983#TD4068E.TXT.r_1348;TD4068E.TXT.r_1349# 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column46: 0.025#TD4068E.TXT.r#585380#585380#TD4068E.TXT.r_1866# sgyu'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column47: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#576877#576877#TD4068E.TXT.r_799;TD4068E.TXT.r_800# yid la byed pa gang zhes dris te / / +yid la byed pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column48: 0.029#TD4018E.TXT.r#3071661#3071661#TD4018E.TXT.r_8806# gzhan gyi dbang yang rmi lam dang  mig 'phrul dang  rab rib dang  gzugs brnyan la sogs pa bzhin du skye ba'i rang  bzhin med pa'i phyir 'dzin pa dang gzung ba'i dngos por ma skyes so // /

column3: rnam par shes pa'i bar gang yin pa de yang yi dags kyi 'gro ba zhes bya'o // / +gzhan yang ser sna kun du bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas yi dags su 'gro zhing yi dags rnams su skye ste yi dags rnams su nying mtshams  sbyor ba de ni yi dags kyi 'gro ba zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#582943#582945#TD4068E.TXT.r_1575;TD4068E.TXT.r_1576# nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams la bdag gam bdag gir yang dag par rjes su lta ba ste / / +gang shes rab nyon mongs pa can no  zhes bya ba smos te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583163#583180#TD4068E.TXT.r_1603;TD4068E.TXT.r_1604;TD4068E.TXT.r_1605;TD4068E.TXT.r_1606;TD4068E.TXT.r_1607# de'i lan du / / +de dag nyid kyi dbang du byas nas rtag pa'am chad par yang dag par rjes su lta ba ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583181#583188#TD4068E.TXT.r_1606;TD4068E.TXT.r_1607;TD4068E.TXT.r_1608# de nyid ces bya ba'i sgra nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dang sbyar te / / +rtag pa'am chad par lta ba yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la dmigs nas 'byung bas na / /
column7: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584062#584064#TD4068E.TXT.r_1708;TD4068E.TXT.r_1709# de'i lan du tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang  de'i gnas kyi phung po rnams la dag pa dang grol ba dang  'byung bar yang dag par rjes su lta ba  ste ; / +gang shes rab nyon mongs pa can no zhes bya ba smos te / /
column8: 5.960#TD4068E.TXT.r#583867#583867#TD4068E.TXT.r_1688;TD4068E.TXT.r_1689# lta ba rnam pa gsum po de dag nyid dang  de'i gnas phung po    rnams la mchog dam pa gtso bor yang dag par rjes su lta ba ste / / +gang shes rab nyon mongs pa can no zhes bya ba smos te / /
column9: 0.017#TD4066E.TXT.r#2110746#2110747#TD4066E.TXT.r_1206;TD4066E.TXT.r_1207;TD4066E.TXT.r_1208# dang bdag gir zhes bya ba ni mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba rnam par gcod pa'o // / +yang dag par rjes su lta ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'byed pa'o // /
column10: 0.017#TD4067E.TXT.r#1092407#1092407#TD4067E.TXT.r_992# lta ba rnam pa gsum po de dag nyid dang  de'i gnas phung po rnams  la mchog dang  gtso bo dang  khyad par du 'phags pa dang  dam par yang dag par rjes su lta ba'i shes rab nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la / /
column11: 0.027#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2912932#2912932#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_6318# nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la dmigs nas  gang zag dang chos yod par rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: gzhan yang ming dang  rnam pa'i tshig dang  tshig bla dags zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583189#583199#TD4068E.TXT.r_1607;TD4068E.TXT.r_1608;TD4068E.TXT.r_1609;TD4068E.TXT.r_1610# rtag pa'am chad par lta ba yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la dmigs nas 'byung bas na / / +de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas zhes bya'o // / +yang na de nyid kyi sgra 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang sbyar  te ; /

column3: lha'i 'gro ba gang zhe na / / +smras pa / / +lha rnams dang 'dra bar gyur pa nas skye mched thob pa'i bar dang  lha der skyes pa rnams kyi ma bsgribs la  lus du ma bstan pa'i gzugs nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583200#583207#TD4068E.TXT.r_1610;TD4068E.TXT.r_1611# 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyus rtag pa dang chad pa'i lta ba 'byung bas na de nyid kyi dbang du byas nas zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583207#583219#TD4068E.TXT.r_1611;TD4068E.TXT.r_1612;TD4068E.TXT.r_1613# 'jig tshogs su lta bas phung po lnga la bdag dang bdag gir bltas pa de la zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.028#TD4061E.TXT.r#1521653#1521654#TD4061E.TXT.r_1174# gzugs gang rtag pa dang  brtan pa dang ther zug pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /

column3: rnam par shes pa'i bar gang yin ba de yang lha'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o // / +gzhan yang lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang  ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang  yid kyis legs par spyod pa chen po kun du bsten zhing bsgoms te mang du byas pas lhar  'gro zhing lha rnams kyi nang du skye ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583220#583229#TD4068E.TXT.r_1612;TD4068E.TXT.r_1613;TD4068E.TXT.r_1614# de la rtag pa zhes bya ba ni ther zug la bya ste / / +dper na sbrul gyi gsob  bor ba bzhin du lus bor nas bdag de yod par lta ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583230#583245#TD4068E.TXT.r_1613;TD4068E.TXT.r_1614;TD4068E.TXT.r_1615;TD4068E.TXT.r_1616# dper na sbrul gyi gsob  bor ba bzhin du lus bor nas bdag de yod par lta ba'o // / +chad par lta ba ni tshe gcig nas gcig tu 'pho ba na yang phung po lnga bor bar zad kyi / /

column3: lha rnams kyi nang du nyid mtshams sbyor ba de ni / / +lha'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o // / +gzhan yang ming dang rnam pa'i tshig ces bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583244#583257#TD4068E.TXT.r_1615;TD4068E.TXT.r_1616;TD4068E.TXT.r_1617# bdag ces bya ba de ni rtag pa ste / / +de la zhig pa'am shi ba med cing ther zug tu gnas so zhes lta ba ni rtag par lta ba'o // /

column3: mi'i 'gro ba gang zhe na / / +smras pa / / +mi rnams dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang  grogs su gyur pa dang   skal ba mnyam ba dang  gnas thob pa dang  gzhi thob pa dang  skye mched thob pa dang  mi 'dir skyes pa rnams kyi ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang  chor ba dang  'du shes dang  'du byed rnams dang  rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de yang mi'i 'gro ba    zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583258#583269#TD4068E.TXT.r_1617# dper na shing mes tshig  nas thal bar gyur pa slar shing du mi 'gyur ba bzhin du 'dir shi phan chad rgyun chad de phung po gzhan len pa med do zhes lta ba ni chad par lta ba zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583270#583287#TD4068E.TXT.r_1617;TD4068E.TXT.r_1618;TD4068E.TXT.r_1619# dper na shing mes tshig  nas thal bar gyur pa slar shing du mi 'gyur ba bzhin du 'dir shi phan chad rgyun chad de phung po gzhan len pa med do zhes lta ba ni chad par lta ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: gzhan yang lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang  ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang  yid kyis legs par spyod pa chung du kun du bsten zhing bsgoms te mang du byas pas mir 'gro zhing mi rnams kyi nang du skye ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583288#583297#TD4068E.TXT.r_1618;TD4068E.TXT.r_1619;TD4068E.TXT.r_1620;TD4068E.TXT.r_1621# yang dag par rjes su lta ba zhes ba ni de ltar nges par 'dzin cing de ltar rtog cing dpyod do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +gti mug dang ldan zhing     // / +rmongs pa dang bcas pa la ni rtag pa dang chad par lta ba 'byung gi // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583297#583311#TD4068E.TXT.r_1620;TD4068E.TXT.r_1621# rmongs pa dang bcas pa la ni rtag pa dang chad par lta ba 'byung gi // / +gti mug med pa'i shes rab can rnams la rtag pa dang chad par lta ba mi 'byung bas rtag pa dang chad par lta ba 'di yang gti mug dang ldan pa dang rtag chad med pa'i chos la rtag pa dang chad par phyin ci log tu 'dzin  pas na shes rab nyon mongs pa can zhes bya'o // /

column3: mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba de ni / / +mi'i  'gro ba zhes bya'o // / +gzhan yang ming dang  rnam pa'i tshig dang  tshig bla dags dang  ming du btags pa dang  kun du rig pa dang  gdags pa dang  tha snyad kyi mi'i 'gro ba yang mi'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583311#583327#TD4068E.TXT.r_1621;TD4068E.TXT.r_1622;TD4068E.TXT.r_1623# gti mug med pa'i shes rab can rnams la rtag pa dang chad par lta ba mi 'byung bas rtag pa dang chad par lta ba 'di yang gti mug dang ldan pa dang rtag chad med pa'i chos la rtag pa dang chad par phyin ci log tu 'dzin  pas na shes rab nyon mongs pa can zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'gro ba gang la skye gnas du yod ce na / / +smras pa / / +sems can dmyal  ba pa rnams ni rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas gcig pu yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583328#583339#TD4068E.TXT.r_1622;TD4068E.TXT.r_1623;TD4068E.TXT.r_1624# de'i las kyang dbu ma'i lam nas 'byung ba la bgegs byed do // / +de la dbu ma'i lam ni rtag pa dang chad par 'dzin pa rnams spangs nas rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba shes pa ste / /

column3: dud 'gro rnams la skye gnas du yod ce na / / +smras pa / / +bzhi po thams cad yod do // / +yi dags rnams la skye gnas du yod ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583340#583351#TD4068E.TXT.r_1624;TD4068E.TXT.r_1625# dbu ma'i lam nges 'khor ba nas byung nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i  lam thob par byed pas dbu ma'i lam nas 'byung ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: rdzus te skye ba gcig pu yod do // / +la la ni yi dags rnams la mngal nas skye ba  yang yod do zhes zer ba yang yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583348#583362#TD4068E.TXT.r_1624;TD4068E.TXT.r_1625;TD4068E.TXT.r_1626# dbu ma'i lam nges 'khor ba nas byung nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i  lam thob par byed pas dbu ma'i lam nas 'byung ba zhes bya'o // / +rtag pa dang chad par bltas na dbu ma'i lam de rtog par mi 'gyur bas na dbu ma'i lam nas 'byung ba la bgegs byed pa'o // /
column5: 0.009#TD4054E.TXT.r#1025180#1025182#TD4054E.TXT.r_5656;TD4054E.TXT.r_5657# de spangs sa ma ma spangs par khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir te / / +'byung ba dang mthun pa'i sdug bsngal ba'i mtshan nyid la byed pas so sor rtogs pa ni dpyod pa'i yid la byed pa'o // /
column6: 0.013#TD4068E.TXT.r#586554#586554#TD4068E.TXT.r_1995;TD4068E.TXT.r_1996# ma dad pa yod pa na ma dad pa'i shugs kyis mnyan pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa dge ba byed mi 'dod pas le lo'i rten byed pa'o // / +le lo'i rang bzhin  bstan pa'i phyir // /
column7: 0.013#TD4068E.TXT.r#587978#587979#TD4068E.TXT.r_2160;TD4068E.TXT.r_2161# 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la rtog pa ni mi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas na mi bde bar gnas pa'i rten byed pa'o // / +dpyod pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir    dpyod pa gang zhe na zhes dris te / /
column8: 0.015#TD4069E.TXT.r#637486#637487#TD4069E.TXT.r_2074# go rims bzhin du zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni sems nyams pas 'chi ba'i phyir dang  rmongs pas 'chi ba'i phyir 'chi ba ni bzang po ma yin par rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.015#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#936397#936397#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5991# dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.016#TD4053E.TXT.r#3002831#3002833#TD4053E.TXT.r_5064;TD4053E.TXT.r_5065# smra ba'i  yon tan dang nyes pa brtags nas mi byed pas 'byung ba ni chad pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +byed pas 'byung ba ni lcogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column11: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1050670#1050672#TD4054E.TXT.r_9397;TD4054E.TXT.r_9398;TD4054E.TXT.r_9399# smra ba'i yon tan dang nyes pa brtags nas mi phyed pas 'byung ba ni chad pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ba'i phyir  ro ; / / +byed pas 'byung ba ni / /
column12: 0.016#TD4069E.TXT.r#629545#629550#TD4069E.TXT.r_958;TD4069E.TXT.r_959# de 'byung ba'i rgyu'i gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir ro // / +yongs su smin par  mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun par 'jog par mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column13: 0.017#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#799967#799968#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_5534;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_5535# lus kyi dbang po'i rdul phra rab rnams ni zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste / / +shin tu mang ba'i phyir phrad par    'dod pas gzung bar 'dod pa'i dngos po la yang thams cad brten pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro // /
column14: 0.017#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1462877#1462877#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7348;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7349# 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rgyu dang bdag po yin no zhes 'byung ba ni rgyu'i rkyen dang bdag po'i rkyen no zhes bya ba'i  tha tshig ste / / +cig car 'byung ba med pa'i phyir lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yang ma yin no // /
column15: 0.018#TD4054E.TXT.r#997953#997953#TD4054E.TXT.r_1057;TD4054E.TXT.r_1058# 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ches zhi ba'i phyir te / / +de kun du 'byung ba dang mi mthun par rig par bya'o //// /
column16: 0.018#TD4068E.TXT.r#586327#586329#TD4068E.TXT.r_1964;TD4068E.TXT.r_1965# 'di'i las kyang nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i  nyon mongs pa skye ba'i grogs byed pa'o // / +rgod pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /
column17: 0.019#TD4047E.TXT.r#1155287#1155287#TD4047E.TXT.r_5020;TD4047E.TXT.r_5021# legs par bslabs pa ni las de la mkhas par byas pas de lta bu'i rang bzhin ston pa'o // / +bcol ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir / /
column18: 0.019#TD4032E.TXT.r#1959950#1959950#TD4032E.TXT.r_6266;TD4032E.TXT.r_6267# rang bzhin gyis 'byung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // / +ngo bo nyid med par shes pas shes bya'i ngo bo nyid med par mi byed de / /
column19: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1371025#1371025#TD4037E.TXT.r_7323;TD4037E.TXT.r_7324# sa ring du song ba las 'byung ba bzhin no // / +byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas bsdus pa'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya ste / /
column20: 0.019#TD4051E.TXT.r#1245987#1245987#TD4051E.TXT.r_1888;TD4051E.TXT.r_1889# byang chub sems dpa' la stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yod pa'i phyir ro // / +dngos po'i mtshan mar rnam par  rtog pa'i gnyen por bka' stsal pa / /
column21: 0.020#TD4068E.TXT.r#593191#593191#TD4068E.TXT.r_2737;TD4068E.TXT.r_2738# de gnyi ga la tha snyad mkhas par bya ba'i phyir ni yi ge'i tshogs bstan pa'o // / +so so'i skye bo'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /
column22: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1037405#1037405#TD4054E.TXT.r_7454;TD4054E.TXT.r_7455# cha mnyam spyod pa gang / / +nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gnas pa'o // /
column23: 0.021#TD4052E.TXT.r#2864023#2864023#TD4052E.TXT.r_2553# gal te kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i phyir bdag po'i rkyen nyid yin rgyu'i rkyen du mi 'grub pas / /
column24: 0.022#TD4054E.TXT.r#1046205#1046205#TD4054E.TXT.r_8729;TD4054E.TXT.r_8730;TD4054E.TXT.r_8731# brjod pa ma gtogs par brjod pa'i     // / +ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro // / +khyad par du rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ngo bo nyid kyis mi skye ba'i zhes bya ba nas rnam par byang ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te / /
column25: 0.023#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1477817#1477817#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9044;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9045# gong mar skyes pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i ngo bo nyid sa 'og ma pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // / +spyod lam pa la sogs pa yang ma yin te / /
column26: 0.023#TD4052E.TXT.r#2855583#2855583#TD4052E.TXT.r_1749# ngo bo nyid sna tshogs rnam par dbye ba'i phyir rkyen gyis dngos por gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'di  las 'byung bas na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes bya ba'i phyir te / /
column27: 0.023#TD4065E.TXT.r#433885#433885#TD4065E.TXT.r_939;TD4065E.TXT.r_940# 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i    ye shes thob ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dang mi mthun pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'o // / +gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'o // /
column28: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#909467#909467#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_2426# sa dang po las byung nas sa gnyis par 'jug par 'byung ba yang dang po'i rang bzhin sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin pa dang  de'i yon tan sangs rgyas brgya'i zhal lta ba la sogs pa kun rdzob tu  sa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar gzhag pa yang yid la byed la / /
column29: 0.026#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1630275#1630275#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5862;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5863# rgyur gyur pa'i yan lag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin te / / +'di  las 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column30: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261794#261795#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6002;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6003# 'di ltar mi rtag pa rags pa 'di la brten nas mi rtag pa phra mo la sogs pa rjes su dpag pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma la gnas nas     // / +dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /

column76: 0.021#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1986952#1986952#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1195;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_1196# gang zag log par lta ba 'am bdag tu lta ba zhig gzhan dag la 'jig rten pha rol tu med pa 'am bdag yod  par ston par 'dod pas ngag skyes par byed pa'i sems kha phyir bltas pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pas tshig tu smra bar byed kyi / / +lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pas ni ma yin pa'i phyir na bar du chod par 'gyur ro // /
column77: 0.022#TD4068E.TXT.r#577311#577311#TD4068E.TXT.r_862;TD4068E.TXT.r_863# mos pa gang zhen zhes dris te / / +mos pa'i rang bzhin dang  mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column78: 0.024#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#772638#772638#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_963;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_964# nyams su myong ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro // / +gang na gzugs kyi go yod pa'o zhes bya bas ni bya ba'i sgo nas  kyang 'di yod pa nyid du ston par byed do // /
column79: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#582101#582102#TD4068E.TXT.r_1464# log pa'i nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir log pa'i nga rgyal gang zhe na zhes dris te / /
column80: 0.027#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1667626#1667627#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11693;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11694# phyin ci log gi mdo las mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +de las  ni bdag kho na dbang byed par lta ba na / /
column81: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#582020#582020#TD4068E.TXT.r_1457# chung ba'i nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir chung ba'i nga rgyal gang zhe na zhes dris te / /
column82: 0.028#TD4068E.TXT.r#576970#576970#TD4068E.TXT.r_811;TD4068E.TXT.r_812# sems pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / / +sems pa gang zhe na zhes dris te / /
column83: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2567572#2567572#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3969;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3970;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3971# 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa log par zhugs pa'i lta ba thams  cad log par lta ba yin te / / +log par rtog pa'i phyir ro // / +gzhan dag ni sgro 'dogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ji ltar chad par lta ba sgro 'dogs par byed pa yin zhe na / /
column84: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#796193#796193#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4920;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_4921# ji ltar nges par sems pa la mi 'jug pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab rtog par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa can dang  nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i shes rab gzhan la rtog pa la sems par ma zhugs pa'i phyir / / +rtog par  byed pa ma yin pas lta ba ma yin te / /
column85: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2025453#2025453#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_6851# de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun du sbyor ba lta ba'i rang bzhin yin bzhin du lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column86: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#592765#592765#TD4068E.TXT.r_2689;TD4068E.TXT.r_2690# yi ge'i tshogs kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / / +yi ge'i tshogs gang zhe na zhes dris te / /
column87: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#581237#581237#TD4068E.TXT.r_1371;TD4068E.TXT.r_1372;TD4068E.TXT.r_1373# de'i las kyang sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa'o // / +khong khro ba'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / / +khong khro ba gang zhe na zhes dris te / /
column88: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520758#520758#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9248# de'i phyir de nyid las bdag gir lta ba dang  mi mthun pa'i phyir stong pa'o // /
column89: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1132631#1132631#TD4047E.TXT.r_1641;TD4047E.TXT.r_1642# mthar thug pa'i dus su rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro  zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o // / +gang bdag nyid nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i bde ba nye bar sgrub par byed pa dang  nges par gzhan dag la yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o // /

column3: 'dir ni nyin mo bu lnga btsas // / +mtshan mo gzhan lnga btsas gyur nas // /

column5: 0.028#TD4068E.TXT.r#573105#573105#TD4068E.TXT.r_283# de yang sna'i dbang po'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column7: 0.028#TD4068E.TXT.r#573234#573234#TD4068E.TXT.r_301# lus kyi dbang po'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column3: zos su zin kyang de dag gis // / +bdag ni 'grangs par ma  gyur to // / +zhes smras pa lta bu'o // /

column3: lha rnams la skye gnas du yod ce na / / +smras pa / / +rdzus te skye ba gcig pu yod do // / +mi rnams la skye gnas du yod ce na / /

column3: bzhi po thams cad yod do // / +mi rnams la sgo nga las skye ba'i skye gnas ji ltar yod ce na / /

column3: smras pa / / +dper na 'dzam  bu'i gling pa'i tshong pa mang po rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas bskor ba rnams kyis khrung khrung gzhon nu ma gnyis mthong ba las gcig ni bros / /

column3: de gnyis smin te brtol ba las  byis pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gnyis byung nas / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste / / +de nyid kyis brtson pa dang sbyor ba dang  'bad pa byas pas mchog gi 'bras bu dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583457#583471#TD4068E.TXT.r_1645;TD4068E.TXT.r_1646;TD4068E.TXT.r_1647;TD4068E.TXT.r_1648# byed pa rnam pa gsum ni 'jig rten gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa dang  sa bon 'jog par  byed pa dang  mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'o // / +'jig rten gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa ni tshe 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshes phyi mar skye bar byed pa ste / /

column3: tshe dang ldan pa de gnyis rdzu 'phrul che     // / +zhing mthu che bar gyur te / / +brag dang nye ba'i brag ces bya bar gyur pa lta bu dang  dper na ri dags dgra'i bu mo sa ga las sgong sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583470#583483#TD4068E.TXT.r_1647;TD4068E.TXT.r_1648;TD4068E.TXT.r_1649# 'jig rten 'di med / / +'jig rten phyi ma med ces smra bas 'jig rten gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa la skur pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583484#583493#TD4068E.TXT.r_1649;TD4068E.TXT.r_1650;TD4068E.TXT.r_1651# sa bon 'jog par byed pa ni    lus kyi rgyu pha'i khu ba dang ma'i mi gtsang ba 'jog par byed pa ste / / +pha med ma med ces smra bas ni sa bon 'jog par byed pa la skur pa'o // /

column3: de dag smin te brdol ba las byis pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa / /

column3: tshan po che chen po'i  stobs dang ldan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583503#583515#TD4068E.TXT.r_1651;TD4068E.TXT.r_1652;TD4068E.TXT.r_1653;TD4068E.TXT.r_1654# mtshams sbyor bar byed ba ni sems can gang dag padmo la sogs ba'i nang du rdzus te skyes pa'am / / +rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du 'phos pa ste / / +sems  can rdzus te skyes pa med ces smra bas ni mtshams sbyor bar byed pa la skur pa'o // /

column3: de dag gis nyes pa 'ga' zhig byas pa'i phyir ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal skrag pas bsad pa lta bu dang  dper na 'das pa'i dus na lnga len gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo padma can las sgo nga lnga brgya byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583515#583523#TD4068E.TXT.r_1654;TD4068E.TXT.r_1655# 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa med ces smra ba ni yod pa'i dngos po chud za bar byed pa ste / /

column3: de dag smin te brdol ba las  byis pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583539#583548#TD4068E.TXT.r_1657;TD4068E.TXT.r_1658;TD4068E.TXT.r_1659;TD4068E.TXT.r_1660# kun 'byung med ces smra ba ni rgyu la skur pa'o // / +sdug bsngal med ces smra ba ni 'bras bu la skur pa'o // /

column3: tshan po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya byung ste / / +de dag 'ga' zhig las skyo ba skyes nas skra dang kha spu rnams bregs te rab tu byung nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583549#583558#TD4068E.TXT.r_1659;TD4068E.TXT.r_1660;TD4068E.TXT.r_1661# lam med ces zer ba ni byed pa la skur pa'o // / +'gog pa med ces zer ba ni yod pa'i dngos po 'jig pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583558#583568#TD4068E.TXT.r_1661;TD4068E.TXT.r_1662# yang na rten cing 'brel bar  'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis nyon mongs pa dang las dang sdug bsngal gsum du gzhag go // /

column3: de dag brtson pa dang sbyor ba dang  'bad pas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par  sangs rgyas pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583569#583578#TD4068E.TXT.r_1662;TD4068E.TXT.r_1663;TD4068E.TXT.r_1664# de la ma rig pa dang sred pa dang len pa gsum ni nyon mongs pa'i yan lag tu gzhag ste / / +de med ces smra ba ni rgyu la skur pa'o // /
column5: 0.006#TD4032E.TXT.r#1926781#1926783#TD4032E.TXT.r_1108;TD4032E.TXT.r_1109# tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni / / +rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang   skye mched drug dang reg PA DANG TSHOR BA DANG  skye ba dang rga shi zhes bya ba yan lag lhag ma rnams te / /

column7: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1035669#1035669#TD4054E.TXT.r_7238# bsgyur ba'i lta ba dang  kha na ma thob ba med par lta ba dang  nges par 'byung bar lta ba dang  brnyas pa'i lta ba dang  brnyas pa'i lta ba dang  rab tu 'khrug pa'i lta ba dang  phyin ci log tu lta ba dang  'phel ba'i lta ba dang  khas mi len pa'i lta ba dang  ngan gyo'i lta ba dang  bkur sti'i lta ba dang  rmongs pa'i lta ba dang  rtsa ba'i lta ba dang  lta ba la lta ba ma yin par lta ba dang  sbyor ba sel ba'i lta ba dang  nges par 'byin pa ma yin par lta ba dang  sgrib pa sogs pa'i lta ba dang  bsod nams ma yin pa 'phel ba'i lta ba dang  'bras bu med pa'i lta ba dang  chad pas bcad pa'i lta ba  dang ; /

column34: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#593206#593206#TD4068E.TXT.r_2740# so so skye bo'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column35: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#593812#593812#TD4068E.TXT.r_2819# rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column36: 5.960#TD4068E.TXT.r#583867#583868#TD4068E.TXT.r_1688;TD4068E.TXT.r_1689# lta ba rnam pa gsum po de dag nyid dang  de'i gnas phung po    rnams la mchog dam pa gtso bor yang dag par rjes su lta ba ste / / +gang shes rab nyon mongs pa can no zhes bya ba smos te / /
column37: 0.021#TD4068E.TXT.r#583848#583849#TD4068E.TXT.r_1685;TD4068E.TXT.r_1686# lta ba bsnyems ba gang zhen zhes dris te / / +lta ba bsnyems pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column38: 0.022#TD4054E.TXT.r#994925#994925#TD4054E.TXT.r_554# tshul khrims dang  brtul zhugs dang  tshul khrims dang  brtul zhugs kyi gnas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams la dag pa dang  grol ba dang  nges par 'byin par yang dag par rjes su lta ba  gang / /
column39: 0.022#TD4066E.TXT.r#2110746#2110747#TD4066E.TXT.r_1206;TD4066E.TXT.r_1207;TD4066E.TXT.r_1208# dang bdag gir zhes bya ba ni mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba rnam par gcod pa'o // / +yang dag par rjes su lta ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'byed pa'o // /
column40: 0.022#TD4067E.TXT.r#1092407#1092407#TD4067E.TXT.r_992# lta ba rnam pa gsum po de dag nyid dang  de'i gnas phung po rnams  la mchog dang  gtso bo dang  khyad par du 'phags pa dang  dam par yang dag par rjes su lta ba'i shes rab nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la / /
column41: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#591828#591828#TD4068E.TXT.r_2578;TD4068E.TXT.r_2579# mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang  mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // / +de'i lan du de ltar de dag gi rgyun 'jig pa'o zhes bya ba  smos te ; /
column42: 0.028#TD4068E.TXT.r#586341#586341#TD4068E.TXT.r_1967;TD4068E.TXT.r_1968# rgod pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // / +de'i lan du / /
column43: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#583158#583158#TD4068E.TXT.r_1602;TD4068E.TXT.r_1603# mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // / +de'i lan du / /

column3: ming aa mras bskyangs ma zhes bya bar gyur nas / / +bu mo de yang tshogs kyis tshogs kyi spyad par byas pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584070#584082#TD4068E.TXT.r_1709;TD4068E.TXT.r_1710;TD4068E.TXT.r_1711# gang shes rab nyon mongs pa can no zhes bya ba smos te / / +de la srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge ba'i las byed pa las slar ldog pa ni tshul khrims so // /

column3: de la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang brjod par bya ste / / +de ltar na mi  rnams la drod gsher las skye ba'i skye gnas yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584083#584091#TD4068E.TXT.r_1711# mgo bregs pa dang  sgren mor 'phyan pa la sogs pa'i lus kyi cha lugs 'dzin pa dang  kha zas gcod pa dang  ba lang dang khyi la  sogs pa'i spyod lam 'dzin pa ni brtul zhugs so // /

column3: de rnams la rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas ji ltar yod ce na / / +smras pa / / +dper na bskal pa dang po pa thams cad rdzus te skyes pa lta bu dang  dper na dge slong ma dgon pa ma skra bregs shing gos dur smrig gon bzhin du dgon pa nas  byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584092#584100#TD4068E.TXT.r_1711;TD4068E.TXT.r_1712;TD4068E.TXT.r_1713# mgo bregs pa dang  sgren mor 'phyan pa la sogs pa'i lus kyi cha lugs 'dzin pa dang  kha zas gcod pa dang  ba lang dang khyi la  sogs pa'i spyod lam 'dzin pa ni brtul zhugs so // / +tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyang phung po lnga la brten nas 'byung ba ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584110#584118#TD4068E.TXT.r_1713;TD4068E.TXT.r_1714# tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa 'byung ba'i rgyu phung po lnga yin pas na phung po lnga ni de'i gnas zhes bya'o // / +tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang  de'i gnas kyi  phung po la brten nas srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa byas pa'i las sbyong zhing dag par 'gyur ro zhes 'dzin pa ni yang dag par rjes su lta ba'o // /
column6: 0.015#TD4068E.TXT.r#583901#583902#TD4068E.TXT.r_1691;TD4068E.TXT.r_1692# de'i gnas  phung po rnams la zhes bya ba ni lta ba gsum po de dag kyang phung po lnga la dmigs PA LAS 'BYUNG BAS LTA ba gsum 'byung ba'i rgyu phung po lnga yin pa'i phyir ro // / +phung po lnga ni de'i gnas zhes bya'o // /

column3: de la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang brjod par bya ste / / +de ltar na mi rnams la rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584119#584128#TD4068E.TXT.r_1714;TD4068E.TXT.r_1715# tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang  de'i gnas kyi  phung po la brten nas srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa byas pa'i las sbyong zhing dag par 'gyur ro zhes 'dzin pa ni yang dag par rjes su lta ba'o // /

column3: ci'i phyir sems can dmyal ba rnams zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +yid du 'ong ba med cing bde ba dang yid bde ba dang bral ba'i phyir rgyu des na sems can dmyal ba    rnams zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#584057#584057#TD4068E.TXT.r_1708# de'i lan du tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang  de'i gnas kyi phung po rnams la dag pa dang grol ba dang  'byung bar yang dag par rjes su lta ba  ste ; /

column3: ci'i phyir dud 'gro rnams zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +dud de 'gro zhing dud de 'ongs pas na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584144#584162#TD4068E.TXT.r_1715;TD4068E.TXT.r_1716;TD4068E.TXT.r_1717# tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang phung po 'dis 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba las grol bar byed do zhes 'dzin pa ni grol bar  yang dag par rjes su lta ba'o // / +tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang de'i gnas kyi phung po 'dis 'khor ba las 'byung zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam thob par byed do zhes 'dzin pa ni 'byung bar yang dag par rjes su lta ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: de'i phyir dud 'gro rnams zhes bya'o // / +ci'i phyir yi dags rnams zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / /
da ltar yi dags rnams kyi rgyal po gshin rje ji lta ba bzhin du de'i dus na yi dags rnams  kyi rgyal po pha zhes bya bar gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584163#584174#TD4068E.TXT.r_1717;TD4068E.TXT.r_1718# don dun tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang  de'i gnas  kyi phung po la brten nas 'khor ba las 'byung zhing mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob po zhes 'dzin pa ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: pha'i yul du 'gro'o // / +pha'i yul nas 'ong ngo zhes zer nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584175#584184#TD4068E.TXT.r_1717;TD4068E.TXT.r_1718# don dun tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang  de'i gnas  kyi phung po la brten nas 'khor ba las 'byung zhing mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob po zhes 'dzin pa ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa zhes bya'o // / +gti mug dang ldan zhing rmongs pa dang bcas pa rnams la tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur zhes 'dzin pa 'byung gi  rmongs pa med cing shes rab rnams la tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam gyis thar par 'gyur zhes 'dzin pa mi 'byung bas tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa 'di gti mug dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir shes rab nyon mongs pa can zhes bya'o // /

column3: ming yi dags yi dags zhes bya bar gyur te / / +rgyu des na yi dags rnams zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584185#584192#TD4068E.TXT.r_1718# gti mug dang ldan zhing rmongs pa dang bcas pa rnams la tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur zhes 'dzin pa 'byung gi  rmongs pa med cing shes rab rnams la tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam gyis thar par 'gyur zhes 'dzin pa mi 'byung bas tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa 'di gti mug dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir shes rab nyon mongs pa can zhes bya'o // /

column3: ci'i phyir mi rnams zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +rgyal po nga las nu des bstan pa'i mi rnams ni las chen  po'o cog blos bskyed pa dang  bsams te 'jal zhing nye bar brtags nas byed pa dang  brtags shing gzhal te nye bar rtog par byed pas na mi mi zhes bya bar gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584193#584202#TD4068E.TXT.r_1718# gti mug dang ldan zhing rmongs pa dang bcas pa rnams la tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur zhes 'dzin pa 'byung gi  rmongs pa med cing shes rab rnams la tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam gyis thar par 'gyur zhes 'dzin pa mi 'byung bas tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa 'di gti mug dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir shes rab nyon mongs pa can zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584203#584219#TD4068E.TXT.r_1718;TD4068E.TXT.r_1719;TD4068E.TXT.r_1720# gti mug dang ldan zhing rmongs pa dang bcas pa rnams la tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur zhes 'dzin pa 'byung gi  rmongs pa med cing shes rab rnams la tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam gyis thar par 'gyur zhes 'dzin pa mi 'byung bas tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa 'di gti mug dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir shes rab nyon mongs pa can zhes bya'o // /

column3: rgyu des na mi rnams zhes bya'o // / +ci'i phyir lha rnams zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +'bar ba'i phyir na lha rnams zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584220#584230#TD4068E.TXT.r_1720;TD4068E.TXT.r_1721;TD4068E.TXT.r_1722;TD4068E.TXT.r_1723# bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab    kyi gzhung las tshul khrims la brten nas ting nge 'dzin bsgoms te shes rab bskyed nas rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas / / +tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs ni dag pa'i rgyu yin na ci'i phyir tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa zhes bya / /

column3: gzhan yang 'gro ba rnams dang  skye ba rnams dang  lus thob pa rnams kyi mchog yin pas na lha rnams zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584231#584241#TD4068E.TXT.r_1721;TD4068E.TXT.r_1723;TD4068E.TXT.r_1722;TD4068E.TXT.r_1724;TD4068E.TXT.r_1725;TD4068E.TXT.r_1726# tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs ni dag pa'i rgyu yin na ci'i phyir tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa zhes bya / / +yang dag pa'i  lta ba dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs ni thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas na / /

column3: ci'i phyir mtho ris zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +sems can de dag bde ba dang ldan zhing skyid la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584237#584254#TD4068E.TXT.r_1723;TD4068E.TXT.r_1724;TD4068E.TXT.r_1725;TD4068E.TXT.r_1726;TD4068E.TXT.r_1727# yang dag pa'i  lta ba dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs ni thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas na / / +tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa zhes mi bya'i // / +'jig tshogs su lta ba'am / /
column5: 0.020#TD4029E.TXT.r#2143241#2143242#TD4029E.TXT.r_2941;TD4029E.TXT.r_2942# bsams pas ni bar du dge ste rigs pas nges pa brtags pa las skyes pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad na thob par  nus pas dga' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro // / +bsgoms pas ni tha mar dge ba yin te / /
column6: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1154358#1154359#TD4047E.TXT.r_4879# de ltar phongs pa rnams dang sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la nyung du'am dman pa yang rung sbyin gnas rnams la  mang po'am gya nom pa'i sbyin pas yongs su smin pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.025#TD4050E.TXT.r#1103281#1103281#TD4050E.TXT.r_879;TD4050E.TXT.r_880# rnam par grol ba'i lus de'i rgyur gyur pa ni nyan thos rnams rnam par grol ba'i rgyur gyur ba ste / / +gang las de 'ba' zhig pa'i rnam par grol bar 'gyur gyi chos kyi sku ni mi thob bo // /
column8: 0.025#TD4049E.TXT.r#2291273#2291273#TD4049E.TXT.r_715;TD4049E.TXT.r_716;TD4049E.TXT.r_717# rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i dmigs pa ni don dam par yod pa'o // / +thams cad kyang don dam par yod pa'o // / +bdag la rnam par dag pa'i rgyur mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1827129#1827129#TD4039E.TXT.r_1496;TD4039E.TXT.r_1497# rgyu 'di nyid kyis ni de dag gi lhag  pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'i kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o // / +tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lus kyi mdud pas ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa'i kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1185674#1185675#TD4047E.TXT.r_9247;TD4047E.TXT.r_9248# de  yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam pas rgyur 'dzin pa dang  'bras bur 'dzin pa'o // /

column3: gnod pa med cing / / +gnod pa med pa'i chos dang ldan te / / +bde ba  dang  yid bde ba mchog dang  gnod pa med pa'i bde ba dang  bde ba'i tshor ba dang ldan pas na mtho ris zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584255#584273#TD4068E.TXT.r_1726;TD4068E.TXT.r_1727;TD4068E.TXT.r_1728# mthar 'dzin par lta ba'am log par lta bas yongs su zin pa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs ni thar pa'i  rgyur mi 'gyur gyi bcings pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas na tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa zhes bya'o // / +'di'i las kyang lus sha thang chad pa'i 'bras bu don med par byed pa ste / /

column3: ci'i phyir lha'i bu mo zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +gsal zhing rnyog pa med pa'i phyir lha'i bu mo zhes bya ba dang  bag byed cing dga' ba'i shas che ba'i phyir lha'i bu mo zhes  bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584271#584281#TD4068E.TXT.r_1728;TD4068E.TXT.r_1729# lta ba log pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsrungs kyang thar pa thob par mi 'gyur bas na lus  sha thang chad pa'i 'bras bu don med par byed pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: rgyu des na lha'i bu mo rnams zhes bya'o //// / +rgyu gdags pa / / +bam po bdun pa ste tha ma / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584282#584293#TD4068E.TXT.r_1729;TD4068E.TXT.r_1730;TD4068E.TXT.r_1731# lta ba lnga po de dag las lta ba du zhig ni sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin / /

column3: ci'i phyir ma zhes bya zhe na smras pa / / +nu zho snun par byed pa dang  gso bar byed pa'i phyir ma zhes bya ba dang  mkhas shing blo dang ldan pa'i phyir ma zhes bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584290#584304#TD4068E.TXT.r_1730;TD4068E.TXT.r_1731;TD4068E.TXT.r_1732# lta ba du zhig ni skur pa 'debs pa'i rang bzhin zhe na / / +'jig tshogs su lta ba dang mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba las rtag par lta ba dang lta ba bsnyems pa dang tshul khrims  dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa rnams ni sgro 'dogs pa'i rang bzhin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584498#584505#TD4068E.TXT.r_1756# 'jig tshogs su lta ba dang  mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang  log par lta ba dang  lta ba bsnyems pa dang  tshul khrims dang  brtul zhugs bsnyems pa dang lnga las log par lta ba dang  lta ba bsnyems pa dang  tshul khrims dang   brtul zhugs bsnyems pa gsum la ni lta ba 'og ma GSUM ZHES BYA STE / /
column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584501#584514#TD4068E.TXT.r_1756# 'jig tshogs su lta ba dang  mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang  log par lta ba dang  lta ba bsnyems pa dang  tshul khrims dang  brtul zhugs bsnyems pa dang lnga las log par lta ba dang  lta ba bsnyems pa dang  tshul khrims dang   brtul zhugs bsnyems pa gsum la ni lta ba 'og ma GSUM ZHES BYA STE / /

column3: rgyu des na ma zhes bya'o // / +ci'i phyir pha zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +skye ba 'grub pa la bu rgyud kyi las dang 'brel pa'i rgyu dang po de yin pa dang  rkyen de yin pas na de'i phyir pha zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584305#584316#TD4068E.TXT.r_1731;TD4068E.TXT.r_1732;TD4068E.TXT.r_1733# 'jig tshogs su lta ba dang mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba las rtag par lta ba dang lta ba bsnyems pa dang tshul khrims  dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa rnams ni sgro 'dogs pa'i rang bzhin no // / +log pa'i lta ba dang  mthar 'dzin pa las chad par lta ba ni skur ba 'debs pa'i rang bzhin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584317#584331#TD4068E.TXT.r_1732;TD4068E.TXT.r_1733;TD4068E.TXT.r_1734;TD4068E.TXT.r_1735;TD4068E.TXT.r_1736# log pa'i lta ba dang  mthar 'dzin pa las chad par lta ba ni skur ba 'debs pa'i rang bzhin no // / +the tshom gyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /
column6: 0.021#TD4017E.TXT.r#2672049#2672049#TD4017E.TXT.r_2365;TD4017E.TXT.r_2366# med pa ni bdag gi phung po phyi ma med par 'dzin pa ste chad par lta ba'o // / +mthar lta ba  dang log par lta ba las lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis su 'dzin pa ni yod med ces bya'o // /

column3: ci'i phyir zhang po zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +ma dang rigs gcig tu 'brel pas na / /
column4: 1.192#TD4068E.TXT.r#581511#581511#TD4068E.TXT.r_1405# nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to / /

column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584588#584605#TD4068E.TXT.r_1762;TD4068E.TXT.r_1763;TD4068E.TXT.r_1764;TD4068E.TXT.r_1765# de la 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas rang bzhin gyis yod pa'i 'dod chags pa dang khong khro ba dang  ma rigs pa dang  nga rgyal dang  'jig tshegs su lta ba dang  mthar 'dzin par lta ba rnams ni / / +lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya'o // / +gzhan las gtsug lag thos nas 'phral du bsams nas skyes pa'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang  ma rig pa dang  nga rgyal dang  'jig tshogs su lta ba dang  mthar 'dzin par lta ba rnams ni yongs su brtags pa'o // /
column6: 1.192#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#954488#954491#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8254;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_8255# nyon mongs pa  drug la bya ba'am / / +'dod chags dang  khong khro ba dang  nga rgyal dang  ma rig pa dang  'jig tshogs su lta ba dang  mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang  log par lta ba dang  lta ba bsnyems pa dang  tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa dang  the tshom ste nyon mongs pa bcu la bya'o // /
column7: 0.023#TD4067E.TXT.r#1092624#1092624#TD4067E.TXT.r_1023# lhag ma ni lhan cig skyes pa dang kun tu brtags pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang  khong khro ba dang  nga rgyal dang ma rig pa dang  'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang sbyar ro / /
column8: 0.028#TD4049E.TXT.r#2288607#2288607#TD4049E.TXT.r_204# sems pa dang  yid la byed pa dang  reg pa dang  'dun pa dang  mos pa dang  dran pa dang   ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab dang  dad pa dang  ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa dang  ma chags pa dang  zhe sdang med pa dang  gti mug med pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  bag yod pa dang  btang snyoms dang  rnam par  mi 'tshe ba dang  'dod chags dang  khong khro ba dang  nga rgyal dang  ma rig pa dang  the tshom dang  'jig tshogs la lta ba dang  mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang  lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang  tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang  log  par lta ba dang  khro ba dang  khon du 'dzin pa dang  'chab pa dang  'tshig pa dang  phrag dog dang  ser sna dang  sgyu dang  gyo dang  rgyags pa dang  rnam par 'tshe ba dang  ngo tsha med pa dang  khrel med pa dang  rmugs pa dang  rgod pa dang  ma  dad pa dang  le lo dang  bag med pa dang  brjed nges pa dang  shes bzhin ma yin pa dang  rnam par gyeng ba dang  gnyid dang  'gyod pa dang  rtog pa dang dpyod pa'o // /

column3: mi de bsad nas de dag 'di snyam sems te / / +mi 'di ni gtum po zhig ste / /

column3: bya'o // / +ci'i phyir glang po che zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te / /

column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584779#584790#TD4068E.TXT.r_1790# de nas khro ba'i 'og tu 'dis bdag la gnod pa 'di lta bu zhig byas pas lan ma lon bar du mi gtong ngo snyam du sems shing zhe sdang gi bsam pa rgyun du sems la 'jog cing mdud par 'dzin pa mi gtong ba ni khon du 'dzin pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de 'dir  skyes nas des lag pa gnyis sa la btsugs te / / +de'i sna yang ring por gyur nas / /

column3: lag pas 'gro zhing lag pas 'ong bas ming glang po che glang po che zhes bya bar gyur te / /

column3: rgyu des na glang po che rnams zhes bya'o // / +ci'i phyir rta zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / /
sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa  zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam bar bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te / /

column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584831#584838#TD4068E.TXT.r_1798;TD4068E.TXT.r_1799# da ltar phan 'dogs par byed / / +phyis phan 'dogs par byed pas 'di la gnod par mi bya bar mi gtong ngo snyam du zhe  sdang gi bsam pa rgyun du mi gtong ba ni khon du 'dzin pa zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4019E.TXT.r#2429398#2429398#TD4019E.TXT.r_3032;TD4019E.TXT.r_3033# yang sangs rgyas rnams ni de 'dra ba'i byed ba dang bral mod kyi gang gi mjug thogs su gang skye bar nges pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba don dam par 'dod de de 'dra ba'i byed pa dang yang bral ba'o // / +'di la zhes pa la     // /
column7: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#12513#12513#TD4036E.TXT.r_1819;TD4036E.TXT.r_1820# de la zas ran par yongs su longs spyod par byed cing / / +zas ran pa ma yin pas yongs su longs spyod par mi byed pas na // /
column8: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#33549#33549#TD4036E.TXT.r_5127;TD4036E.TXT.r_5128# yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed cing rab tu 'dzin par byed pa'o // / +de la so sor brtag par 'os pa'i yid la byed pa ni / /
column9: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#45061#45061#TD4036E.TXT.r_6865# de la dmigs pa'i sred pas yang 'byung ba'i sred pa'i srid par skyed par byed cing / /
column10: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#232901#232901#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2410# 'di la gshe bar byed pa dang  gshe bar bya ba dang  khro bar bya ba dang  mtshang 'bru bar byed pa dang  mtshang 'bru bar bya ba dang  rdeg par byed pa dang  brdeg par bya ba 'ga' yang med do // /

column3: de 'dir skyes nas dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyu bar gyur to // / +de nas sems can de dag gis mthong nas 'di skad du kye su'i  zhes bya pa dang  smras pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584839#584854#TD4068E.TXT.r_1799;TD4068E.TXT.r_1800;TD4068E.TXT.r_1801# phyis phan 'dogs par byed pas 'di la gnod par mi bya bar mi gtong ngo snyam du zhe  sdang gi bsam pa rgyun du mi gtong ba ni khon du 'dzin pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#585190#585197#TD4068E.TXT.r_1843;TD4068E.TXT.r_1844# 'di yang zhe sdang gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par  yod par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#585348#585352#TD4068E.TXT.r_1860;TD4068E.TXT.r_1861# sems kyi kun tu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pas 'dod chags kyi shas kyis chos gos dang lhung bzed la sogs pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams dang  dngos po gang mi mkho ba dang ngan pa yang gzhan la gtong mi phod cing zang zing rnams sdud  par byed pa la ni ser sna zhes bya'o // / +'di yang 'dod chags kyi shas las 'byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#585463#585470#TD4068E.TXT.r_1871;TD4068E.TXT.r_1872# 'di yang 'dod chags dang gti mug gi shas kyis yon  tan yod pa ma yin kyang yon tan can du ston cing sgrogs par byed pas 'dod chags dang gti mug gi shas las byung ba'i phyir rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#585837#585842#TD4068E.TXT.r_1910;TD4068E.TXT.r_1911# longs spyod tshogs pa 'ba' zhig la sems 'dzin cing mi gtong gi dge ba'i sems 'jug pa'i dbang med par byas pa ni rgyags pa zhes bya'o // / +'di yang 'dod chags kyi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#586229#586232#TD4068E.TXT.r_1951# 'di  yang ngo tsha mi shes pa dang 'dra bar 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#586313#586318#TD4068E.TXT.r_1962;TD4068E.TXT.r_1963# sems mi gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa la rmugs pa zhes bya'o // / +'di yang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#586394#586399#TD4068E.TXT.r_1973;TD4068E.TXT.r_1974;TD4068E.TXT.r_1975# der sems 'phros nas sems yeng yeng  por ma zhi bar byed pa'i rgyu byed pa la rgod pa zhes bya'o // / +'di yang 'dod chags kyi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi / /
column12: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#586530#586539#TD4068E.TXT.r_1991;TD4068E.TXT.r_1992;TD4068E.TXT.r_1993;TD4068E.TXT.r_1994# mya ngan las 'das pa dang  'phags pa'i lam la 'dod pa med pas na ma dad pa ni dad pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya'o // / +'di yang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi / /
column13: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#586709#586711#TD4068E.TXT.r_2018;TD4068E.TXT.r_2019# chos 'di bzhi'i shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi / / +btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /

column15: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#586924#586926#TD4068E.TXT.r_2044# de'ang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column16: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#587177#587187#TD4068E.TXT.r_2066;TD4068E.TXT.r_2067;TD4068E.TXT.r_2068# de ltar shes rab nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur bas lus kyi spyod pa 'gro 'dug ldang nyal dang   ngag gi spyod pa smra ba dang mi smra bar bya ba dang  yid kyi spyod pa bsam pa dang mi bsam par bya ba rnams la bdag da ltar 'di byed cing 'dug go zhes mi shes pa dang  bya ba dang mi bya ba'i dmigs mi shes pan shes bzhin med pa zhes bya'o // / +'di yang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par    yod par rig par bya'o // /
column17: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#587373#587378#TD4068E.TXT.r_2089# 'gyod pa gsum  las 'gyod pa mi dge ba dang  'gyod pa lung du ma bstan pa gnyis ni gti mug gi shas las byung ba 'gyod pa de dag ni gti mug med pa'i shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column18: 0.009#TD4068E.TXT.r#584962#584962#TD4068E.TXT.r_1811;TD4068E.TXT.r_1812# khyod kyi sdig pa 'di lta bu zhig byas kyi shogs shig ces byas pa dang sdig pa ma bshags na sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur bar mi shes pa'i gti mug gi dbang du song nas bdag gis sdig pa ma  byas so zhes nas kha na ma tho ba byas pa ma khyud cing bsnyon pa ni 'chab pa zhes bya'o // / +'di yang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags bar yod par rig par bya'o // /

column35: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#580983#580983#TD4068E.TXT.r_1348;TD4068E.TXT.r_1349# 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // / +de'i lan du / /
column36: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#582020#582020#TD4068E.TXT.r_1457# chung ba'i nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir chung ba'i nga rgyal gang zhe na zhes dris te / /
column37: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#582101#582101#TD4068E.TXT.r_1464# log pa'i nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir log pa'i nga rgyal gang zhe na zhes dris te / /

column3: de 'dir skyes nas mchu gnyis 'phyang la mgrin pa yang gye gu can du gyur nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584888#584900#TD4068E.TXT.r_1805;TD4068E.TXT.r_1806;TD4068E.TXT.r_1807# 'chab pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // / +de'i lan du bdag gi kha na ma tho bar mkhyud ba'o zhes bya ba smos te / /

column3: de dag 'di skad du / / +mchu gnyis 'phyang ngo mchu gnyis 'phyang ngo zhes zer nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584899#584912#TD4068E.TXT.r_1806;TD4068E.TXT.r_1807;TD4068E.TXT.r_1808;TD4068E.TXT.r_1809# de'i lan du bdag gi kha na ma tho bar mkhyud ba'o zhes bya ba smos te / / +kha na mtho ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las byas pa'o // /
column5: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1015745#1015747#TD4054E.TXT.r_4179;TD4054E.TXT.r_4180;TD4054E.TXT.r_4181# khro ba la sogs par rig par bya'o // / +yang 'dod chags ni sems las byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'o // /
column6: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#29011#29011#TD4036E.TXT.r_4430;TD4036E.TXT.r_4431;TD4036E.TXT.r_4432;TD4036E.TXT.r_4433# de de la brten nas rang gi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa'am / / +'dod chags dang bral ba'am / / +zhe sdang dang bcas pa'am / / +zhes sdang dang bral ba'am / /
column7: 0.023#TD4041E.TXT.r#1276398#1276399#TD4041E.TXT.r_1143;TD4041E.TXT.r_1144# chags par 'gyur ba ni sems kun tu 'dzin pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o // / +'ching bar 'gyur ba ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi gnas su gyur pa'o // /
column8: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2780437#2780437#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11061;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11062;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_11063# de la kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa ni 'di ltar 'di na la la 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa'am / / +zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa'am / / +gti mug gi kun nas dkris pa'am / /
column9: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#196318#196319#TD4035E.TXT.r_12501;TD4035E.TXT.r_12502;TD4035E.TXT.r_12503# gtan du spong ba'i lan btab bo // / +rtog pa med pa'i bsam gtan pas ni rgyang ring por spong ba'o // / +'dod chags dang  zhe sdang dang  gti mug gi kun nas dkris pa dang  bag la nyal ba can du  spangs pas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i lan btab ste / /

column3: de dag gis de'i ming rnga mo zhes btags te / / +rgyu des na rnga mo rnams zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584910#584920#TD4068E.TXT.r_1808;TD4068E.TXT.r_1809;TD4068E.TXT.r_1810# mkhan po'am slob dpon la sogs pas gleng ba'o // / +'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa'i dbang du mi 'gro zhing / /

column3: ci'i phyir ba lang zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584919#584928#TD4068E.TXT.r_1810# 'jigs pa'i phyir smra ba yin pa la 'dis sdig pa ma bshags na sdug bsngal gyi    rgyur 'gyur ro zhes de la phan par 'dod pa des mang po'i mdun du mi gleng par skabs su bab par byas nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584928#584941#TD4068E.TXT.r_1810;TD4068E.TXT.r_1811# 'jigs pa'i phyir smra ba yin pa la 'dis sdig pa ma bshags na sdug bsngal gyi    rgyur 'gyur ro zhes de la phan par 'dod pa des mang po'i mdun du mi gleng par skabs su bab par byas nas / /

column3: de 'dir  skyes nas tshogs kyi nang nas byung ste / / +dgon pa'i gnas dag na rgyu zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584940#584951#TD4068E.TXT.r_1811# khyod kyi sdig pa 'di lta bu zhig byas kyi shogs shig ces byas pa dang sdig pa ma bshags na sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur bar mi shes pa'i gti mug gi dbang du song nas bdag gis sdig pa ma  byas so zhes nas kha na ma tho ba byas pa ma khyud cing bsnyon pa ni 'chab pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: sems can de tshogs kyi nang nas byung nas dgon pa'i gnas dag na rgyu zhing tshogs kyi nang na mi gnas pa'i phyir de'i ming ba lang zhes bya bar gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584848#584856#TD4068E.TXT.r_1799;TD4068E.TXT.r_1800;TD4068E.TXT.r_1801# phyis phan 'dogs par byed pas 'di la gnod par mi bya bar mi gtong ngo snyam du zhe  sdang gi bsam pa rgyun du mi gtong ba ni khon du 'dzin pa zhes bya'o // / +'di yang zhe sdang gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584952#584970#TD4068E.TXT.r_1811;TD4068E.TXT.r_1812;TD4068E.TXT.r_1813# khyod kyi sdig pa 'di lta bu zhig byas kyi shogs shig ces byas pa dang sdig pa ma bshags na sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur bar mi shes pa'i gti mug gi dbang du song nas bdag gis sdig pa ma  byas so zhes nas kha na ma tho ba byas pa ma khyud cing bsnyon pa ni 'chab pa zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#585348#585352#TD4068E.TXT.r_1860;TD4068E.TXT.r_1861# sems kyi kun tu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pas 'dod chags kyi shas kyis chos gos dang lhung bzed la sogs pa 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams dang  dngos po gang mi mkho ba dang ngan pa yang gzhan la gtong mi phod cing zang zing rnams sdud  par byed pa la ni ser sna zhes bya'o // / +'di yang 'dod chags kyi shas las 'byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#585837#585842#TD4068E.TXT.r_1910;TD4068E.TXT.r_1911# longs spyod tshogs pa 'ba' zhig la sems 'dzin cing mi gtong gi dge ba'i sems 'jug pa'i dbang med par byas pa ni rgyags pa zhes bya'o // / +'di yang 'dod chags kyi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#586313#586318#TD4068E.TXT.r_1962;TD4068E.TXT.r_1963# sems mi gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa la rmugs pa zhes bya'o // / +'di yang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#586394#586399#TD4068E.TXT.r_1973;TD4068E.TXT.r_1974;TD4068E.TXT.r_1975# der sems 'phros nas sems yeng yeng  por ma zhi bar byed pa'i rgyu byed pa la rgod pa zhes bya'o // / +'di yang 'dod chags kyi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi / /
column10: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#586530#586538#TD4068E.TXT.r_1991;TD4068E.TXT.r_1992;TD4068E.TXT.r_1993;TD4068E.TXT.r_1994# mya ngan las 'das pa dang  'phags pa'i lam la 'dod pa med pas na ma dad pa ni dad pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya'o // / +'di yang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi / /
column11: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#586820#586825#TD4068E.TXT.r_2033;TD4068E.TXT.r_2034# brjed par gyur pa la ni dran pa nyams pa zhes bya'o // / +'di yang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na  rdzas su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column12: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#587177#587186#TD4068E.TXT.r_2066;TD4068E.TXT.r_2067;TD4068E.TXT.r_2068# de ltar shes rab nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur bas lus kyi spyod pa 'gro 'dug ldang nyal dang   ngag gi spyod pa smra ba dang mi smra bar bya ba dang  yid kyi spyod pa bsam pa dang mi bsam par bya ba rnams la bdag da ltar 'di byed cing 'dug go zhes mi shes pa dang  bya ba dang mi bya ba'i dmigs mi shes pan shes bzhin med pa zhes bya'o // / +'di yang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags par    yod par rig par bya'o // /
column13: 1.192#TD4068E.TXT.r#586626#586631#TD4068E.TXT.r_2007# 'di yang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su btags su med kyi btags par yod par rig par bya'o // /
column14: 0.024#TD4068E.TXT.r#585624#585624#TD4068E.TXT.r_1891# 'di yang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa dang nyes pa bcabs na sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur bar mi shes pa'i gti mug gi dbang gis 'byung bas na 'dod chags dang gti mug gi shas las 'byung ba'i phyir rdzas su med kyi btags  par yod par rig par bya'o // /

column3: rgyu des na ba lang rnams zhes bya'o // / +ci'i phyir phyugs zhes bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584971#584980#TD4068E.TXT.r_1812;TD4068E.TXT.r_1813;TD4068E.TXT.r_1814;TD4068E.TXT.r_1815# 'di yang gti mug gi shas las byung bas na rdzas su med kyi btags bar yod par rig par bya'o // / +'di'i las kyang rnam pa gnyis byed de / /

column3: smras pa / / +sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584978#584994#TD4068E.TXT.r_1814;TD4068E.TXT.r_1815;TD4068E.TXT.r_1816;TD4068E.TXT.r_1817# 'gyod pa dang mi bde bar gnas pa'i rten byed pa'o // / +chos nyid  kyis gang gis kha na ma tho ba mkhyud pa de la 'gyod pa skye bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584988#585007#TD4068E.TXT.r_1815;TD4068E.TXT.r_1816;TD4068E.TXT.r_1817;TD4068E.TXT.r_1818;TD4068E.TXT.r_1819# chos nyid  kyis gang gis kha na ma tho ba mkhyud pa de la 'gyod pa skye bar 'gyur ro // / +'gyod pa skyes nas gdon mi za bar yid mi bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi bde bar gnas par yang 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#970575#970575#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10292;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10293# chos kyi sbyin pa chen po ston pa rnam pa bzhi 'byung ba dang don gcig tu sbyar ba'i phyir / / +de la dang pos ni mang du thos pa'i phyir gsal bar ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la / /
column7: 0.018#TD4068E.TXT.r#580018#580018#TD4068E.TXT.r_1203;TD4068E.TXT.r_1204# brtson 'grus yod na dge ba'i phyogs 'grub pa dang rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +shin tu sbyangs pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.019#TD4018E.TXT.r#3075297#3075298#TD4018E.TXT.r_9256# rgyu zhig par rgyu'i dngos po med pa'i phyir chad par lta bar 'gyur te zhes pa ni rgyu 'jig pa'i phyir skad cig pa'i gnyis po la 'bras  bu'i dngos po med pas skad cig pa snga ma rgyu ma yin no // /
column9: 0.019#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2541870#2541870#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_892;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_893# des sdig pa las so sor thar pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma dang po kho nas sdig pa las so sor thar par 'gyur ro // / +spang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bor ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column10: 0.020#TD4010E.TXT.r#2269906#2269906#TD4010E.TXT.r_5099;TD4010E.TXT.r_5100;TD4010E.TXT.r_5101# de dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde la 'dod par mi 'gyur te lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i phyir ro // / +mos par yang mi 'gyur te zab mo'i     // / +chos la goms par ma byas pa'i phyir ro // /
column11: 0.021#TD4035E.TXT.r#197928#197928#TD4035E.TXT.r_12763;TD4035E.TXT.r_12764# des chos de thos pas dad pa rnyed par 'gyur te / / +dngos po'i 'dod    pa spang ba'i phyir dang  nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do // /
column12: 0.021#TD4068E.TXT.r#577459#577459#TD4068E.TXT.r_884;TD4068E.TXT.r_885# rang gi lta ba las mu stegs can la sogs pa rgol ba gzhan gyis lta ba gzhan du bsgyur bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro // / +dran pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir / /
column13: 0.021#TD4019E.TXT.r#2494627#2494627#TD4019E.TXT.r_11442# ma byas pa rtag pa'i phyir zhes pa ni de 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du gzhan las khyad par med par 'gyur ba'i phyir / /
column14: 0.021#TD4052E.TXT.r#2845978#2845978#TD4052E.TXT.r_512;TD4052E.TXT.r_513# bdag po'i rkyen yin te mi mthun pa'i phyogs med par gnyen po  med pa'i phyir ro // / +de bas na bdag po'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'ang thob par 'gyur zhes gsungs so // /
column15: 0.021#TD4018E.TXT.r#3069654#3069654#TD4018E.TXT.r_8524;TD4018E.TXT.r_8525# spyir rjes su dpag pa ni ji ltar byas pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o // / +sangs rgyas pa  rnams kyis ni rang bzhin gsum pa'i rgyu ste / /
column16: 0.021#TD4079E.TXT.r#758436#758436#TD4079E.TXT.r_281;TD4079E.TXT.r_282# don dam par yod par 'gyur la kun brtags pa'i  rang bzhin gyis dmigs na ni kun rdzob tu yod par 'gyur te / / +kun nas nyon mongs pa'i don du dmigs pa'i phyir ro // /
column17: 0.021#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1068587#1068587#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2617;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2618;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_2619# de la 'di lta bur gyur cig  snyam pa dang  de 'dra bar gyur cig snyam pa dang  de lta ma yin par gyur cig snyam pa dang  gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang  'di lta bur gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang  'di 'dra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang  de lta ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur     // / +ro zhes gsungs pa yin no // / +'jug pa med pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o // /
column18: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244318#244318#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3883;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3884;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3885# nyon mongs pa dang ldan yang zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir dang      // / +sdug bsngal bskyed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro // / +skyon du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column19: 0.022#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1082595#1082595#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_5019;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_5020;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_5021# da ni ji ltar na sems gzhan gyis mthong la gzhan gyis dran de ltar na ni lha sbyin gyis sems kyis mthong la mchod sbyin gyis sems kyis dran par 'gyur ro // / +ma yin te 'brel pa med pa'i  phyir ro // / +de gnyis ni rgyu dang 'bras bur ma gyur pa'i phyir ji ltar na rgyud gcig la yod pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel ba ni med do // /
column20: 0.023#TD4009E.TXT.r#340990#340991#TD4009E.TXT.r_2757;TD4009E.TXT.r_2758;TD4009E.TXT.r_2759# sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +dul bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin la dmigs par lta ba yin te / /
column21: 0.023#TD4009E.TXT.r#341148#341154#TD4009E.TXT.r_2778;TD4009E.TXT.r_2779;TD4009E.TXT.r_2780;TD4009E.TXT.r_2781;TD4009E.TXT.r_2782# skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin / / +'gag par bya ba'i phyir ma yin / /
column22: 0.023#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2726083#2726083#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3582# dngos po  rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir dang  skad cig pa'i phyir dang  gyo ba med pa'i phyir ro // /
column23: 0.023#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3131354#3131354#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5407# de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir dang  ma byung ba'i phyir dang  ma skyes pa'i phyir dang  ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column24: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136708#1136708#TD4047E.TXT.r_2233# rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu brgyad po 'di dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i phyir dang  yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir  bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya bas phan pa ste gzhan gyi don las brtsams pa'o // /
column25: 0.023#TD4061E.TXT.r#1530641#1530641#TD4061E.TXT.r_2466# gzhan yang rtag tu bsgom pa'i phyir dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  bar chad med par bsgom pa'i phyir dang  chog mi shes par bsgom pa'i phyir ro // /
column26: 0.023#TD4069E.TXT.r#632115#632115#TD4069E.TXT.r_1331# lhag mthong la zhugs pa'i ni rnam par ma zhig pa dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ni rnam par ma zhi ba'i skyon yod pa'i phyir dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column27: 0.023#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2070011#2070011#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13311# rmad du byung ba ni sangs rgyas rnams las gzhan la med pa'i phyir dang  mdzad par dka' ba'i phyir dang  brnyes par dka' ba'i phyir ro // /
column28: 0.023#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#804910#804910#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6376;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6377# de lta ma yin na lkog ma la sogs pa rnams kyang grangs bzhin du med pa la sogs pa la dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po thal bar 'gyur te / / +nges pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro // /
column29: 0.026#TD4046E.TXT.r#2198038#2198038#TD4046E.TXT.r_285;TD4046E.TXT.r_286# grang ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dpyad bzod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'o // / +ma rnyed pas yid mi bde ba med pa'i phyir yongs su gdung ba med pa'i rang bzhin no // /

column3: de 'dir skyes nas dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyu ba mi de dag gi glo nas  'dzin cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#577468#577472#TD4068E.TXT.r_886;TD4068E.TXT.r_887# dran pa gang zhe na zhes dris te / / +dran pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#579193#579196#TD4068E.TXT.r_1086;TD4068E.TXT.r_1087# khrel yod pa gang zhe na zhes dris te / / +khrel yod pa'i rang bzhin  dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#579466#579468#TD4068E.TXT.r_1126# zhe mi sdang  ba gang zhe na zhes dris te zhe mi sdang ba'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#580027#580031#TD4068E.TXT.r_1205;TD4068E.TXT.r_1206# shin tu sbyangs pa gang zhe na zhes dris te / / +shin tu sbyangs pa'i rang bzhin  dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column3: lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#577759#577759#TD4068E.TXT.r_919# shes rab kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column6: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#583371#583375#TD4068E.TXT.r_1627;TD4068E.TXT.r_1628# log pa'i lta ba gang zhe na zhes dris te / / +log pa'i lta ba'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#584049#584049#TD4068E.TXT.r_1707# tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column12: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#592341#592341#TD4068E.TXT.r_2632# tshig gi tshogs kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column13: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#592774#592774#TD4068E.TXT.r_2691# yi ge'i tshogs kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column14: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#593205#593206#TD4068E.TXT.r_2740# so so skye bo'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
column15: 0.0#TD4068E.TXT.r#593808#593812#TD4068E.TXT.r_2818;TD4068E.TXT.r_2819# rnam  par shes pa gang zhe na zhes dris te / / +rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column17: 1.192#TD4068E.TXT.r#583156#583156#TD4068E.TXT.r_1602# mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /

column19: 1.192#TD4068E.TXT.r#587107#587107#TD4068E.TXT.r_2062# shes bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gang zhe na zhes dris pa'i don to // /
